Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-19): "Life saving after the imagine dragons concert! Fast and tasty! Grazieee!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-12): "Very nice, small pizzeria with a peaceful climate and colorful with a thousand flyers with the names of the pizzas. Really good pizza, I always take the double dough which I recommend to everyone. Friendly staff: once they forgot an ingredient and the next time they recognized me and offered me a can for the mistake. With my friends this is also a certain stop for dinner + board games evenings"
    - (1 stars, 2025-01-23): "If I could I would put 0! Waited 1 hour for delivery on Thursday and then pizza delivered to another person and another address. They even question what is said. Disappointment before I could even be a customer I should have read the reviews before ordering and I would have saved myself disappointment and an empty stomach"
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-28): "While passing by to visit a friend I stopped to eat pizza, and I have to give my best compliments. Digestible, well cooked and tasty pizza."
    - (1 stars, 2024-11-19): "I have been a customer of this pizzeria for a long time, but unfortunately I have to say that I will never return. In the last two months they have hired a new cashier, and this is the fourth time she has miscalculated, always on a Saturday night. Each time I tried to kindly point out the error, but it is clear that the situation is not improving. It's a shame, because the food is good, but customer service is equally important"

Reviews:
    - (4 stars, 2023-11-05): "Excellent pizza in Padua! My friends and I sat outside, when the warm July allows to do so. The terrace is just in front of a rather trafficked streed, but the noise is not that bad. The price of pizzas and beverages is a bit above average, but pizza here is totally wirth it. The crust was high and soft, and the dough was well prepared and not heavy at all. For my taste, it was a bit too cheesy, and covered a bit the flavour of the tomato sauce. However, that doesn't mean that I didn't enjoy my pizza. On the contrary, I think it's one of the pizzas I've ever had in Padua!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-15): "Very very tasty pizzas! Especially the crust, it's different and delicious. Good desserts as well. The place looks pretty old and very simple, but food is amazing ü§©"
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-13): "One of the best pizzas we ever had."
    - (4 stars, 2023-07-12): "Good pizzas at fair prices, but very few beers to choose. Perfect location before/after a visit to the stadium."
    - (5 stars, 2016-08-19): "Very nice place. The owner takes time for you to find the right meal, speaks fluent english and is very patient and polite. The food is delicious. Everything is clean. Recommended!"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2023-05-24): "Takeaway pizzeria among the best in Padua. In the right place...just to celebrate with a good pizza. It is also characterized by friendliness and kindness. And.. then the orange "pumpkin" shaped oven is truly unique!!! thank you!üíêüëç"

    - (5 stars, 2025-01-02): "I always get pizza from them when I go to visit my grandparents and I must say that they have very good and not heavy pizza! Also very friendly staff"
    - (5 stars, 2024-10-01): "The best takeaway pizzeria in Padua. Perfect pizza, very tasty and never left in the stomach! Impeccable dough. The staff is kind and helpful. The delivery boys are quick and friendly. Highly recommended"
    - (3 stars, 2024-03-02): "I don't feel like giving more than this opinion, which I consider sufficient, for these reasons: the delivery was 25 minutes late (it wasn't a holiday...), the parmigiana arrived with ham (but when ever??? Being a vegetarian I didn't even taste it!), I was terribly thirsty until the next day. I am sorry. Update after your response: I didn't have the price list, I ordered by phone, so I didn't know that your parmigiana had ham. And it's true that I didn't eat that pizza but, in order not to go hungry, I tasted the others in the same order. And what do we want to say about the delay???"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-12-31): "Bright and clean place with self-service. Menu with few dishes, simple but well-prepared: choice between three first courses, three second courses and three side dishes (see photo). Low prices: 10 euros for a first course and a second course with side dish and bread, drinks not included. Fast and courteous service, attentive and kind staff. I will definitely be back!!!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-11): "Good welcoming restaurant even if it is self-service Bright room with one side open to the supermarket, Good food and prices too Staff Welcoming, sunny and friendly first and foremost Good cleaning Wide choice of sandwiches, appetizers, first courses and second courses"
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-16): "Good value for money. Excellent courtesy and friendliness of the staff. There is the advantage that the bar is inside a supermarket.     - (4 stars, 2023-01-02): "Inside the Iper Rossetto. In front of the cash register number 20. With access also from the external parking lot of the hypermarket. I would definitely recommend it to everyone looking for overall great atmosphere and not being afraid of slightly spicy food (which is prepared in very decent spicy variant for hosts, but next time I‚Äôll definitely try even the real spicy one:D)."
    - (5 stars, 2022-07-20): "Best food"
    - (4 stars, 2025-03-19): "Local located in the Arcella area of ‚Äã‚ÄãPadua, behind the station. The location is slightly small but comfortable. The cuisine is very good, and there is a wide choice of dishes typical of Bangladeshi culture. Excellent quality ingredients, coming directly from the owner's crops. Fresh and excellent vegetables to add to dishes to enrich dishes. The owner is very kind, friendly and approachable, to the point of talking to us and having a pleasant conversation. Super convenient value for money (spending ‚Ç¨7 for lunch for 2 dishes of rice)"
    - (1 stars, 2023-12-18): "Very simple Indian restaurant with authentic, inexpensive and very tasty cuisine. We were there several times and everything tasted extremely good. The service was very friendly. We will come back when we are in Padua and can recommend it to all fans of Indian cuisine."
    - (5 stars, 2024-10-15): "Very good restaurant I come here often and when I go in I never regret it and the restaurant is perfect and fast serious people it is not an Indian restaurant but Bangladesh is different and better"

XIANG DIMSUM is a restaurant located at Via T. Aspetti, 43, 35132. 
It has an average rating of 4.9 over 5 based on 452 costumers.
It is considered moderate ($$). This restaurant offers delivery, dine-in, and reservation services. It serves lunch, dinner, beer, and wine. 

Opening hours:
- Monday: Closed
- Tuesday: 7:00 ‚Äì 10:30 PM
- Wednesday: 12:00 ‚Äì 2:30 PM, 7:00 ‚Äì 10:30 PM
- Thursday: 12:00 ‚Äì 2:30 PM, 7:00 ‚Äì 10:30 PM
- Friday: 12:00 ‚Äì 2:30 PM, 7:00 ‚Äì 10:30 PM
- Saturday: 12:00 ‚Äì 2:30 PM, 7:00 ‚Äì 10:30 PM
- Sunday: 12:00 ‚Äì 2:30 PM, 7:00 ‚Äì 10:30 PM

Phone: 049 232 4245

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-26): "The place is super cute, and calm, but be sure to make a reservation since it's booked! It has very cute plates and different motives from Ghibli studio movies. The food was quickly prepared and was very fresh and tasty. But all in all a very cute place and worth visiting."
    - (5 stars, 2024-10-12): "I think this is the best dim sum we have had so far in Italy. Also, very good pad thai. We will be coming back here many times for sure."
    - (5 stars, 2023-07-30): "Been back 2x now. Photos are from first visit and second vist with to go order. Take home order. Service is always beyond amazing. Highly recommend. We saw this place in a fb video. I took a screen shot so we could find it. This never showed on google when I looked up good Chinese restaurants and bao or dim sum restaurants. This is now our favorite ‚ù§Ô∏è. I had some dishes I haven't had accurately in months. This place is perfect! If you don't like the food here, the problem is you not the restaurant because this place is perfect. We loved the food. It was beyond amazing. Reminds of the food I had when living in Beijing and Hawaii. Service is wonderful. Everyone was so kind. And most speak English which helps. I can understand a few languages but I can be nervous having a conversation. But I can communicate when needed. Even though they were busy on a Tuesday. They gave each table perfect service. Our second black bao was forgotten in the order and we were charged for it. So we are considering that a tip to them instead of being upset about it. The restaurant was so busy. And they had 1 British customer causing a lot of trouble. I felt bad for his date and for the servers handling him. So why we were not upset over the kissing bao and tea. (Second order of tea was missing too, but we were not charged for it) mistakes happen. Will still be going back often when we can. We live locally, but very busy traveling around Italy and the usa for work. The price here is very good compared to other places. Most places way over charge and the food is a mockery. The food here is beyond outstanding ‚ù§Ô∏è. I lobe fusion style food too."
    - (5 stars, 2024-05-08): "The restaurant I visited today, with its unique features, provided me with an enjoyable experience. I ordered the shrimp dumplings and savored its delightful taste. The friendly and respectful behavior of the restaurant staff made me feel welcomed. The English menu offered to me helped me establish effective communication and place my order in the best way possible. The traditional Chinese serving style added a special charm to my experience, and I enjoyed it."
    - (3 stars, 2024-11-18): "It was ok but nothing special. After reading the reviews and looking at the ratings, we expected something at least a little special, unusual, nice. However the dumplings were just dumplings, the pad thai was completely bland and tasteless, the coffee was over extracted (very bitter) even though the beans were clearly good quality (they were just poorly prepared). There are two paths to take for every asian food restaurant : practical and cheap fast food or a restaurant that will give you an unforgettable new experience. I love both types of restaurants but this place is right in the middle of the spectrum. the food is not unique and tasty enough yet, the atmosphere is not captivating, however the portions are small and the prices are rather high."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-29): "Great ramen restaurant in Padova. The food is delicious and super tasty. We had appetizers and three different vegan ramen. There are a lot of choices and there are six different vegan ramen on the menu. The prices are good and the staff is very friendly and smiley. The atmosphere is nice and fun, a lot of manga and anime references and action figures around the restaurant. Super recommended."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-02): "The venue is relatively small but well arranged, with lot of room between tables. Menu is full of very interesting choices, even beyond ramen. Food is spectacular. Service is fast and kind, you feel very comfortable. Bathrooms are tidy. In the block it could be somewhat difficult to find a parking spot, but eventually you'll do."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-07): "Amazing ramen with an amazing manga atmosphere. It seems to not be in Padova. Ramen was perfect, a lot of different types with great choice. Also the sides are very nice. Price very affordable in comparison to other places. Personnel very friendly and warm, and very precise and fast to every request. Indice the restaurant you can try and wear like a real cosplay."
    - (5 stars, 2024-07-20): "This is my first time at Chakramen and it was amazing! The ramen is super good and d the place is full of Japanese mangas ‚ò∫Ô∏è Highly recommend!"
    - (3 stars, 2023-12-07): "The best: costume to put on. You can dress up because they have some shirts and masks for the clients. Tech ordering because you use a tablet. Super fast ramen, less than 5min waiting. The flavour was ok, not so special. The best was the bao sandwich with duck for only 5.5‚Ç¨. The worst: the pistacchio cake, dry and seemed that it was for 2 days ago."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-06-05): "Driving from Venice to Bologna, we stopped at this restaurant by chance and so glad we did! This may be the best Pakistani food I have ever had. We ordered the chicken karhai, seekh kabob, cholay and haleem. Everything was delicious and the naans were hot and fluffy. If you‚Äôre in the area and craving some comfort Pakistani food, this is the place. Highly recommend."
    - (4 stars, 2023-06-15): "A traditional pakistani restaurant with the original flavours at a decent price and ambience.. Was amazed to find a garlic nan close to the original in padova.. And chicken curry was hot with a good blend of spices.. A must try place for the Indian/Pakistani food lovers.. The owner is very cordial and even gave discounts on eid.. And of course NO COPERTO charges.."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-17): "I've been there 5 times already and the food was top tier every single time. The food portions are worth the price and the staff is lovelyüåπ"
    - (5 stars, 2024-06-28): "Nestled in Padua, K.N. Ristorante offers a tantalising blend of Italian and Pakistani cuisines, creating a unique dining experience. Indulge in succulent mix grill platters, aromatic chicken kharai, and freshly baked tandoori naan. For a taste of Italy, savor the exquisite Magretta pizza, perfectly paired with crispy fries. Don't miss this culinary journey where East meets West, only at K.N. Ristorante."
    - (5 stars, 2024-10-15): "I have been to many countries so far In Europe and I can tell with great surety that this restaurant was best so far. Either it was authetic recipes or taste of each traditional spices. Anyone who is visiting near Venice must try this restaurant with just 5 minutes walk from Padova central station."

    - (1 stars, 2023-12-07): "Delivery & take-away only. I would have loved giving a better rating as the owners seem to be nice and offer good service, yet the food I received was terrible‚Ä¶ Not only it was poor quality and greasy (I would still have eaten it, and it would have been ok for the price), but the chicken was absolutely uncooked, almost raw üòì I could only eat the vegetables‚Ä¶ Maybe they should consider reducing the options but prepare it better and take the time to cook it well."
    - (1 stars, 2023-05-13): "Zero stars. Chicken with almonds: looking for the chicken was difficult among the many vegetables (6 small pieces), but the almonds were easy (one almond). Better to call the dish "chicken vegetables". The gelatinous and fatty chicken, disgusting and it couldn't be worse. The filling of the grilled ravioli tastes like old meat, really not very pleasant. Cantonese rice is basically white rice. All very bland. Absolutely not recommended!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-07): "I absolutely recommend it for a simple reason, good food (pasta and rice much better than many allcanyoueat) but above all excellent, excellent prices! Probably those who give 1 star have no idea that they are in a take-away rotisserie and not a starred one. I wish all the Chinese "clubs/restaurants" in the area were like this! ü¶æ"
    - (4 stars, 2023-03-30): "Pretty fast delivery and really nice deliveryman! I found the dishes good, however in the pineapple and pine nut rice and spaghetti with vegetables there was very little seasoning, so if I can give one piece of advice it would be to season the dishes more with vegetables etc. Otherwise it was a pleasant meal, thank you! :)"

From my experience I have to say that it's all bullshit, the food was fresh and was prepared on the spot, plus it was also good (I recommend the fried chicken, a great surprise). Together with the low prices (there is even a starter+first course+main course combo which saves even more) the experience was generally positive, friendly staff and excellent food, highly recommended especially for students* who like me are both poor and hungry P.s. the only flaw is the addition of prawns (or dishes with prawns) entails the addition of a euro to the list price (which however remains low)"

Ristorante Bronzetti is a restaurant located at Via Pilade Bronzetti, 34, 35138.

Phone: 380 176 3021

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-08): "Located in via Bronzetti in Padua, this restaurant-pizzeria offers a welcoming and relaxing environment, with different rooms that guarantee space and comfort. The menu is rich and varied, both in terms of cuisine and pizza, available in different types of dough, including gluten-free. We ordered a calzone and two burgers with potatoes. The calzone turned out to be really tasty, accompanied by a delicious tomato sauce served separately in a jar, to be added as desired. The burgers, well cooked and tasty, confirmed the attention to the quality of the ingredients. The desserts chapter deserves a special mention: the variety is wide and inviting. The tiramisu prepared directly at the table is a scenographic and delicious experience, enriched with chocolate flakes. We opted for two cups of vanilla and caramel ice cream with pieces of toffee, an authentic delight, and a liquorice sorbet, with an intense flavour. The service was fast and courteous, helping to make the evening even more enjoyable. Overall, a venue that exceeded our expectations and which I recommend without hesitation! Honest prices."
    - (4 stars, 2025-02-27): "Whether it's dinner for two or with friends, it's always welcoming. Staff never intrusive but always present. The gluten-free pizza is excellent (not suitable for celiacs but a spectacle for the intolerant). Good choice of beers. The burgers are also very good. Try the desserts. Stylish environment never too crowded"
    - (4 stars, 2025-01-04): "Bronzetti, ex Kofler, was a pleasant surprise during a dinner with a fish menu. We ate very well, the place is well-kept and well-furnished, excellent service. There is no parking, you have to leave your car along the road or in the adjacent lot in front of the shops, but apart from that the place is definitely recommended."
    - (4 stars, 2025-05-17): "Very large location, perfect for group dinners, but with more intimate spaces that are also suitable for dinners for couples. The menu is varied, with options to suit different tastes. I tried the pizza and found it good: well-seasoned, tasty and above all digestible. The staff was friendly and helpful. Some details of the structure are a bit affected by the difficulty of management related to the large size of the place, but overall the experience was positive."
    - (4 stars, 2025-03-26): "When we arrived it looked like an elegant place and indeed it was. The food was very good, we ordered various fried foods and pizzas as a starter. As a first course we ordered a buffalo cheese risotto (it was a lot). Then for dessert we ordered the very famous Tiramisu, which was also delicious. The staff often dropped items or even food but otherwise they were very kind and friendly. I recommend it to you."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-06): "Excellent value for money. Fresh and delicious sushi."
    - (5 stars, 2022-04-02): "I went myself for lunch. The restaurant locates in a quiet residential area, so it was not busy. It's very clean and the environment is quiet and clear. The staff are nice and friendly. The size of the sushi and dumplings are not big, which is quite suitable for only one person or two people who still wanna have diverse dishes. Food are tasty. In a word, KOUN satisfies me in any aspect! Update: quite a lot of people on Saturday. I went on Sunday before so it was quiet"
    - (5 stars, 2023-05-25): "Excellent food, top quality, good service."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-07): "Very good food in a tranquil environment"
    - (4 stars, 2024-10-25): "My experience at "AKASAKA" began with an aperitif, a campari and a gintonic, we were served with dragon clouds and 1 saucer with 4 nigiri (they could have done better). We stayed to eat for dinner, the choice is not very vast, but taste and quality reign supreme. The mixed ravioli and the sashimi boat with the specials (prawns and scampi) are very good. The atmosphere is very nice even if the place is not very large, in fact it only occupies a few seats (I think more or less 50/70) and the prices are in line with other all you can eat options. For each aperitif they give you so-called "aperitif vouchers", for every 2 vouchers you have the possibility of having the all you can eat menu at the price of 19.90 instead of 27.90. I will definitely come back to try the aperitif again and see if it is customary to bring the small plate that was served to us and maybe keep the vouchers for another evening."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-04-16): "Nice place to have a pizza. They have vegan and vegetarian options, but if I remember correctly they didn't have English menu, which is a bit so-so. The staff was very friendly, though, and made the effort to understand us and talk for a bit. It was for dinner in a working day, the restaurant didn't have much people."
    - (4 stars, 2023-12-04): "Real Napolitan style pizza, loved it. The restaurant is a chain, and you feel that the atmosphere is different than in an authentic restaurant of course. Except for the long wait to be able to pay and the priced higher than average pizza in Padova, it was a nice experience."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-10): "Damn, I never knew that pizza could be this good. Met a delivery guy in Padova and asked where I can get a nice local pizza and was directed here. It was quite a walk but we'll worth it. Definitely the best pizza I had in my life."
    - (5 stars, 2024-07-20): "Came here looking for salad and it was excellent. The staff were friendly and helped us change to a different table (cleaned it for us) and the Caesar salad and black rice salad were excellent! Lovely fresh ingredients and the chicken was correctly cooked."

Website: https://www.bistromexicano.com/
Phone: 049 875 9203

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-20): "I review this place with apprehension, as I don't want other Americans to discover my hidden Mexican food geat away. The flavor is authentic as you can get for northern Mexican/so-cal Mexican food. For those that love spice ask for sides of their homemade hotsauce, they need to bottle and sell it locally it's delicious and balanced with proper heat. It will not melt your taste buds hot but adds the right level of kick italy just lacks. Menu is in Italian and English the red and white sangria are always a perfect pair to any meal you order. 10/10 recommend we travel 1.5 hours to go here once a month."
    - (5 stars, 2022-09-12): "We loved it. I've lived in Texas, California, New Mexico, Arizona and cabo Mexico. So I grew up exposed to different styles of Mexican food. My husband thats Italian is new this type of food and lovvvvvveeeeeessssss it. So we were thrilled to try this restaurant. The female staff is beyond amazing and kind. The drinks we loved so much we had 4. The food was delicious. Wonderful flavor in ever bite. üòã Just wish the male waiter wasn't so rude to us when we arrived and sat down. Before I looked at the menu I asked him if they had a few dishes. He just quickly rudely said no and walked off. My husband was about to yell at him but I told him let it go. Luckily the food I asked about was on the menu. The guy was nicer after he saw that I was talking with the owner. But not about him. We talked about food and travel. So so sweet ‚ù§Ô∏è. Honestly if I hadn't meet her, my review would have less stars because of the guy. But still same good review on the food and drinks. (He was also rude to other tables. I may not speak itlian yet but I understand it and venician. My husband speaks all dialects and a few other languages because of his job. Both of us have lived in Africa as well. And I've lived in China/ Beijing. So I listen to hear if locals are talking badly about me lol üòÜ or others. I mentioned this because we heard another table also upset by his behavior. I know some behavior is the itlian way, but his wouldn't do well in other countries at all. I was a sous chef, restaurant manager at 3 restaurants and executive chef at a casino in the usa. Mostly fusion cuisine. Each country is different of course. But the ones I've lived in except italy wouldn't allow his bad disposition)"
    - (4 stars, 2024-07-02): "The best: the decoration inside. Just went there for some drinks but it was weird they don't have the typical mexican cocktail called Paloma. Anyway I drank a sangria that was ok. Bathroom was cleaned."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-07): "Amazing place with Mexican vibes and colorful decorations."
    - (4 stars, 2019-12-13): "The atmosphere is nice, the employees are super friendly +considerable ,and each set of food is in large amount and dilicious! The only downside is the space at second floor is a little bit smaller. Still, I will recommend the restaurant to my friends!"

We decided I should eat mine... it was cold, bland and unappetizing, but I ate it. After I finished, my husband's meal arrived, but the pasta was clearly under cooked. The waiter agreed and back it went! Almost 40 minutes into our dinner and my husband still had no food. We ate the bread out of the paper bag on the table and drank our bottle of wine. His food arrived, he ate some of it. Meh. We stayed to finish our bottle then made haste to the exit. We're they having a bad night? Who knows. Sadly, we did and I can't in good conscience recommend."
    - (2 stars, 2025-01-27): "Cute place , nice service. Food very disappointed . Spinach without flavor Pasta with truffle very dull Good house wine and tiramisu"
    - (5 stars, 2022-09-24): "One of the best places in Padova. Great food and atmosphere. Local traditional meels. Amazing vine. We loved it."

Reviews:
    - (4 stars, 2025-07-02): "Excellent play on classic dishes from Veneto. The waitress, not Italian, was very knowledgeable and helpful. Definitely worth a second visit! Not so keen on the aggressive booking system and penalty, almost put me off going!"
    - (4 stars, 2025-06-03): "Lovely place! I highly recommend it."
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-16): "User did not leave a review."
    - (4 stars, 2025-03-31): "I finally tried this Trattoria Padovana, which manages to combine tradition and innovation with a completely vegan menu. The culinary offering is truly interesting and the quality of the raw materials is indisputable: each dish is prepared with care, and you can see the attention paid to the choice of ingredients, fresh and genuine, which reflect the Venetian tradition in a completely vegetal version. The staff is welcoming and courteous, ready to recommend with passion the dishes of the day, creating a nice family atmosphere. The peculiarity of the room is certainly the service with dishes to be shared at the center of the table. Personally, I found this concept very interesting, but I have to admit that, although I like the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãtasting a bit of everything, sometimes it can feel slightly forced, especially when there are only a few of you at the table or with people you don't know well. The portions are tasty, but I expected a little more abundance, considering that each dish is meant to be shared. Furthermore, some dishes are sold out and you cannot order more than one per person. The price is around 30-40 euros per person. I found the beers produced by the Crak brewery slightly overpriced, which I expected to be cheaper. In general, I highly recommend this restaurant to those looking for refined and well-made vegan cuisine, but still want to savor the flavors of the Venetian tradition (and not only!). I recommend you book via the restaurant's website. However, I did not appreciate the rigidity of the reservation, which I think is decidedly excessive given that it is a restaurant."
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-07): "A starred chef in a Trattoria * Food: The cuisine of Nicola Cogo, chef and one of the owners, is incredible. He manages to merge the decades of experience gained in some of the most famous starred restaurants (Calandre, Cipriani, Montecchia and others around the world) with the authentic taste of old trattorias. In every dish I tasted I felt a mixture of a tear of nostalgia and a smile of amazement. Plus: on the menu you can always find fresh truffles and wild mushrooms. * Atmosphere: A true contemporary, clean and warm trattoria. * Service: The staff went out of their way to make our experience memorable. Attentive without being intrusive, prepared and professional but always ready with a joke. Plus: the bubbles of their prosecco kindly offered as soon as we sat down. * Price: Considering that there were two of us and we basically had a seven-course tasting menu, ordering and sharing seven dishes, plus an excellent bottle of beer from the Cantina project to start with and a bottle of Aglianico from their estate (which we didn't finish and took home), we spent just over 60 euros each. I consider the price correct, perhaps even economical, considering the quality and workmanship of the dishes. * Negative notes: Very often it is full, it is advisable to book in advance. * Conclusion: An experience absolutely worth doing! I can't wait to return to try other dishes, as the menu rotates a lot based on seasonality."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-08): "This is the fish restaurant sister to A Bando del Buso. Food is obviously great. Fresh ingredients prepared with love and care. I love the mixed appetizer platter for share, and the tuna with vegetables secondi. Service is quite fast. Reservation is recommended on busy nights."
    - (5 stars, 2023-05-08): "Staff was very friendly, food was good (although not the most aesthetically pleasing food)."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-23): "Delicious restaurant (not only good) with fresh ingredients and very refined sauces. Coming to Padua one evening and finding this restaurant was a boond. Prices consistent with the quality of the meal. I highly recommend."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-26): "Absolutely amazing! We were staying in Padua as tourists, and went twice. Two of the best meals we've ever had, and the staff were very kind and accommodating."
    - (5 stars, 2023-08-12): "This is a great restaurant. It has a very unique character. The food is extraordinary delicious. The menu contained only fish and seafood dishes, exactly what we were looking for. Our dinner was cooked perfectly and also the desert was great. The atmosphere is lovely. Rustical but still homely. It seems that mainly local people eat there and not so many tourists like us. The service is perfect. Very friendly and very attentive. The beverage options are very good. The Spritz variations are crafted solid, the wine selection is very good with many specialities. And: In the end I had the best Grappa, that I ever tasted. I even was able to buy one full Bottle of it for taking home, for a reasonable price. In total the prices for dishes and drinks are very fair. My wife and I, we had a wonderful evening in this restaurant! I do not write many reviews but we were really amazed and impressed. In our days it is really hard to find a place with these outstanding attributes and qualities. Thank you!"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-03): "There are two restaurants next to each other: one for meat and the other for fish dishes. Appetizers and horse meat goulash with polenta were excellent, as well as fried peppers and cherry tomatoes. Kids had extra tender chicken breasts. Although the menu is in italian, waitress was very helpful in explaining the different dishes. Service was a bit slower, it was crowded, but everybody was very kind."
    - (4 stars, 2025-01-20): "The best: typical Veneto food. Here you can find traditional dishes. I expected more for the flavor of the food actually, it was good but not delicious. I tried bigoli, the spezzatino di cavallo and tiramis√π. Portions are normal and prices medium. They have a traditional style inside, full of books and wine bottles. Attention was kind and fast. I recommend to book before."
    - (2 stars, 2025-06-01): "We crossed the entire city to have dinner at A Banda Del Buso, our last meal in Padua. Despite the positive reviews online, the experience was unfortunately far from what we expected. We absolutely wouldn't return. ‚Ç¨16 for a quite basic chicken fillet that was entirely unremarkable, and ‚Ç¨5 for side dishes that, in our case, consisted of either two bits of potato or courgettes that were supposedly "crispy". Where is the crispy? Not in the slightest. Why mislead people like that? The portion of baccal√† alla vicentina was tiny, and the antipasti were equally meagre, both of which you can find cheaper, tastier, and far more generous just about anywhere else in Padua. It was a complete letdown from start to finish, and we wouldn‚Äôt go back under any circumstances."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-07): "A friend who lived in Padova for many years before the pandemic recommended this restaurant to us, and I‚Äôm so glad of the recommendation! This restaurant is on a very quiet side street, far away from the touristy parts of the town, and you would find it basically only if you have a local friend who knows about it. In fact there are two restaurants owned by the same owner: A Bando Del Buso specializes in meat dishes; its sister restaurant ‚ÄúOsteria Del Pesche‚Äù just across the street (literally just 3 meters away) specializes in fish. In this review I focus on the meat restaurant. I‚Äôll leave a separate review for the fish restaurant. The food here is the best I found in Padova. They have a small menu: a few appetizers (I especially like the bacala), a few primi, a few secondi, and they have a separate ‚Äúgrilled meat menu‚Äù with three options for grilled meat. My favorite dishes are the mushroom risotto (from Primi), bigoli, panna cotta e frutti di bosco. I also especially like their espresso which is among the best restaurant espresso I‚Äôve had. The mushroom risotto (with truffle) is absolutely excellent. You should also get their side salad which costs only 5 euros but comes in a giant bowl (five times bigger than what I was expecting) and tastes extremely fresh and delicious! They have both indoor and outdoor seating; indoor seating has air conditioning and outdoor seating has shade and fans and plants. I particularly like the fact that they filter their own water and water is included in the ‚Äúcoperto‚Äù. They also have free password-protected WiFi."
    - (3 stars, 2024-12-16): "The atmosphere was really nice. Even though we made the reservation to eat fish, the part that they led us to had meat in the menu which was just disappointing. I tried the lasagna with salted cod fish. The pasta was really nice, the fish was alright but the lasagna overall was too oily. The side dishes we ordered were potatoes and pumpkin. Potatoes were again too oily but they were well cooked, the pumpkin was really really good. The house wine is good, it has a sour taste but very fresh. the desserts were AMAZING! We tried the tiramisu, panna cotta, and the biscotti and they were all really good. The atmosphere and the musics were really cute too. I would recommend going after dinner for a desert and wine, not eat there."

    - (5 stars, 2025-02-10): "This place has such a great vibe‚Äîrelaxed, vibrant, and friendly. It‚Äôs the kind of place where you can grab a drink, chat for hours, and just feel at home. The staff is super welcoming, the prices are fair, and there‚Äôs always a nice mix of people, from students to locals. Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-22): "All the dishes were good and the service was kind."
    - (1 stars, 2025-03-23): "I can honestly say one of the worst dining experiences of my life. When I walked in the staff seemed put off, as if they were annoyed I was there even though I was the only one there. I was placed at a table and given no indication as to how to order. After scanning the QR code from another table I was presented with a menu with no order or intelligence. Halfway through navigating the hell of their online menu the waiter came up and asked if I was ready. I asked for the East and West sushi. He had no idea what I was talking about. I asked I Italian. Blank stares. He had an earphone in, so maybe that was interfering with communication. I gave him my phone and for some reason he condcluded I wanted the scallop sashimi. At this point my only desire was to leave so I agreed, despite it being nowhere near what I wanted. I also ordered the Sake Cassa, which was only a shot on the menu and only four euro. What I was brought was a full cup of sake that i knew would cost way more than four euro. Then the dish came out and it's just an uninspired round of raw scallop with some avacado and way too much horseradish Wasabi. I mean, seriously, it was a mound taller than the actual dish. Like the chef had squeezed three packets onto the plate. I don't know how they would expect anyone to eat that much Wasabi without getting a ruptured anus. I scarfed down the uninspired round, managed to keep my manus intact, thankfully the sake was actually good, and then rushed to the counter so I could get out of there. Of course the bill ended up being much more than I had planned - I went in only wanting some sushi and a shot of sake and ended up with a full dish and a cup of sake - but I was happy to pay the premium just to get out of there. I think myself and the staff have the same mutual feeling, in that we both hope to never see each other ever again. Still tough, it was a beautiful place."
    - (4 stars, 2023-12-18): "A very cozy yet elegant atmosphere that makes you feel at ease and special at the same time! The staff was very friendly and the fish was very fresh. Totally recommend it!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-04): "Best asian food I ever had! Wish I could come to Padova more often just to go here. Every single we tried was excellent, from the sushi to gyoza, to seafood. Also, the staff was really friendly and helpful with recommendations."
    - (4 stars, 2023-08-23): "Very nice restaurant with perfect food!"

    - (5 stars, 2025-05-30): "I wanted to try the cuisine of this restaurant just a stone's throw from the historic center after hearing about their renowned catering service for years. The waitress stole my AirPod (but she did not know that AirPods can be tracked). --- After we finished our cafe, while we were still in the Pasticceria Wiennese, the waitress came over and cleaned up the table. Later, I realized I had left my AirPod on the table, so I returned there, and the waitress (the one on the right on their Facebook page) surprisingly said that it had not been left there! Later, I used the "Find My" app to locate my AirPod. I went to the address, hoping that someone else had found my AirPod. But who was it that opened the door? !!! the waitress! It was her residence!!! She couldn't lie any longer and returned the AirPod to me. --- I was in the "Pasticceria Viennese" at the time she was cleaning up the table, so I trusted her when she said it wasn't left there. I'm reporting this because it could happen to anyone, and I was lucky to be able to track my device."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-20): "Napoli Centrale in Padova is a vibrant spot where you can dive into authentic Neapolitan cuisine. The atmosphere is lively, making it an engaging place to enjoy your meal. The star of the show is their special Napoli pizza, featuring a traditional, slightly charred crust with fresh toppings. But the menu doesn't stop at pizza; there's a variety of pastas, succulent steaks, and fish dishes to choose from. The wine selection is impressive, with dozens of local red, white, and sparkling varieties, enhancing your dining experience without breaking the bank. The food here is authentic, the flavors rich, and the prices reasonable, making Napoli Centrale a hidden gem in Padova. It's a must-visit for anyone seeking a true taste of Naples in this northern Italian city."
    - (5 stars, 2023-06-03): "Magnificent pizza! We had lunch here with a family - four different dishes - dear lord, that‚Äôs so tasty! The service is great! There is no cocktail menu, but if you take an aperol or campari spritz, you will get incredible pleasure! We also got a dessert üåö omg, so good!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-07-18): "Excellent all round. Food , service and atmosphere. Very friendly and attentive staff. I chose to have octopus with cherry tomatoes , black olives and linguine. It was a great choice. Not sure it was actually on the menu. No problem. You will not have much room for anything else."
    - (5 stars, 2024-05-08): "Delicious! We had grilled branzino fish, seafood pasta, dessert, and Aperol Spritz cocktails. It was very tasty! The service was excellent, attentive but unobtrusive. We hope to go back soon."
    - (4 stars, 2025-01-02): "Pizza was just great, restaurant nice and clean (toilet as well, which is not very common in Italy). Just the staff could be more pleasant and hospitable."

    - (5 stars, 2023-03-04): "Amazing selection of beers both on tap and bottled, a nice change from the usual in Padova. Super friendly and knowledgeable manager! Mas Agave beer is a must try"
    - (5 stars, 2023-03-01): "Amazing food and interior."
    - (4 stars, 2019-07-14): "We arrived from a city half an hour away... with reservations of course. The restaurant was empty when we arrived at 9.30pm and we even struggled to find it because it was a little hidden under the galleries. The welcome and the service were excellent, we really liked the interior and structure of the place, we waited a bit for the food to be served, in the meantime 4 other couples arrived. The restaurant was chosen because we are trying various places that do tartare. I would also recommend making a mixed horse or horse-only tartare and also having boiled or baked potatoes as a side dish and grinding it a little more. For the rest everything is excellent, even the bathroom which I always look at. For me, order and cleanliness as well as good food and service must be perfect."
    - (4 stars, 2019-06-22): "A different experience than usual, but one that's guaranteed to please: you only get cold food, especially raw food. The staff is friendly and helpful. We made a reservation, but perhaps it wasn't necessary because it wasn't at all busy. The food is good, but perhaps a little heavy."

It is located 10 minutes away on foot from the train station and a few minutes from the historic center, Porta Molino which was the largest and most monumental of the ancient ones."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-27): "I would give 6 stars for service if I could. It's endearing quite well. The Forzat√© is away from the tourist crowds in a courtyard of a residential complex. A few more trees would be nice, but it's nice and quiet and relaxed. Otherwise, everything that matters: good coffee, sprumata, tramezzini, brioche. Delicious things for lunch too. Good classic spritz with a lot of oomph. Everything at fair prices. Hardly any tourists. But the best thing is the people who work here."
    - (5 stars, 2024-07-20): "I had my graduation reception here, great attention to detail and delicious food, I had a guest who couldn't eat meat and a celiac and they managed to find fantastic options for both of them. I thank you so much from the bottom of my heart for making this day unforgettable!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-04-18): "The nicest bar in the neighborhood! Very kind and helpful... A real pleasure to sit outdoors. Well done"

    - (5 stars, 2024-01-02): "Top-notch gastronomic experience. One more proof that people are the key ingredient in hospitality and food & wine business. From the part where the owner made some space for us and found us a table despite being fully booked to the taste of the main dish and desert paired with truly great wine from the Veneto region‚Ä¶ it was a pleasure to visit this place in Padova."
    - (5 stars, 2022-12-11): "Love a lot the tableware in this restaurant, very interesting and creative. The bread are made by themselves, with delicious olive oil serviced on table, I was already extremely satisfied before the meal. The antipasti were very interesting combination of Italian classical with international fusion, all of them were very appetising. Lovely Christmas atmosphere, I couldn't enjoy more as my first meal in Padova."
    - (4 stars, 2025-03-28): "The ingredients quality is there, although the dishes look more refined than they taste, it‚Äôs nothing new or surprising for the price you‚Äôre paying. The size of the starters is enough, but I would say that some of the main courses are too small, looking like starters. There are some visible damages in the entrance glass and in the ceiling. There‚Äôs no english version of the menu, which is completely unacceptable for a restaurant like this, even smaller cafes and bars have an english menu. In conclusion, the food is good and the service too, but the restaurant tries to sell an image that doesn‚Äôt match the reality."
    - (5 stars, 2024-10-19): "We like everything that we ate at lunch - crichets, pasta and omakase raw seafood. Food was tasty, ingredients fresh and service friendly and responsive."
    - (5 stars, 2023-03-09): "This restaurant is the best. Really really tasty food with a very nice ambient. We highly recommend it"

The service was good: friendly and open for a nice chat. Thank you for bringing ‚Äòa taste of home‚Äô to Padova!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-30): "Delicious tasteful dishes. I‚Äôve tried at least 2 or 3 and they never disappoint. The staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. Totally recommended! Don‚Äôt forget to try the Thai beer üôèüèº"
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-16): "FINALLY a Thai restaurant in Padova!! I tried all their dishes and all of them are super tasty! My favorite will always be the Mystery and Grill Bliss. The customer service is excellent, the food is prepared fast and the quality is top! Highly recommend this place"
    - (5 stars, 2024-06-17): "The best and the only thai restaurant in Padova, it‚Äôs a must try. Prices and portions are perfect also in the beautiful view of piazza dei signori.     - (5 stars, 2024-06-18): "Best Thai food I‚Äôve ever tasted, you have to try their ‚ÄúGrill bliss‚Äù ‚ÄúSassy Balls‚Äù and ‚ÄúHot chick‚Äù very delicious, very umami‚ù§Ô∏è and I like the fact that the kitchen is open in public, you can see how they prepare your food. Love it!"

    - (5 stars, 2025-03-14): "It is a boutique restaurant with Venetian food of exceptional quality. Had stuffed artichokes for an appetizer and main dish of beef with vegetables and an order of ‚Äúravioli‚Äù stuffed with Bransini. Great food and service! Don‚Äôt miss this gem of a Venetian delicacy!"
    - (2 stars, 2023-06-24): "the food was not good and I think it‚Äôs overpriced based on the quality and amount of servings. The pasta with pistachio was very bitter, I don‚Äôt taste the pecorino, and the pancetta was put instead of guanciale as mentioned in the menu (see photo). They also don‚Äôt have other options of non-alcoholic beverage, just coca-cola. We paid 130‚Ç¨ for two persons without even a wine. I think it‚Äôs too much for Padova."
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-11): "Me and my daughter had an amazing meal at this lovely little restaurant run by 2 sisters. The food was to die for. Fried courgette flowers. 2 types of pasta . Rabbit and potato and a delicious chocolate and orange dessert. Would thoroughly recommend if you want something homely and yummy üòã"
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-07): "Very good restaurant with very sympathetic ladies, cook and service. Absolutely recommendable!!!"
    - (5 stars, 2023-05-21): "Great food and service. Awesome wine, Malbec was amazing. Prices are average. My bill was on the higher side due to the amount of wine I ordered. Note that the location on Google Maps is off by ~50m. The osteria is directly at the street, not in a backyard. Once you found the caffe you are in the right area. There are no tables in the street. Majority of patrons were locals, I think I was the only tourist. Happy to return when I visit Padua again."

    - (5 stars, 2022-12-06): "It was so yummy lots of options to choose from. I had taken my boyfriend who had never had Indian food before in his life and he thoroughly enjoyed it. Great place to share food and try new food. The staff was very friendly and they had menus for those that speak English. Highly recommended will definitely be coming back."
    - (1 stars, 2025-06-09): "Had my worst dining experience. I ordered butter chicken with Naan. Firstly they took a lot of time to serve. Secondly, when I had eaten first and only Naan the waiter picked the basket and didn't come back for 10 minutes and I was waiting for naan so that I can eat. I had to ask them why aren't you bringing it. They started arguing that you should have asked for it. Like man come on I am sitting in front of you and you are watching me I am waiting for it and you pick the basket so you are supposed to bring it. My chicken got cold and I didn't eat as I left the place. They were very unprofessional. I won't recommend to go there if you don't wanna ruin your time and peace."
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-10): "Very nice experience, food was really delicious and restaurant has a really good vibe, prices are bit high compare to the amount of food"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-09): "This type of Chinese food is no easy find in this part of Italy. So many Chinese restaurants in Italy feature the same dishes, for however good they might be, the menus vary little. I lived in Taiwan for about a year ages ago, this restaurant filled me with nostalgia and almost brought tears to my eyes. Finding this type of MaLaTang and Chinese-style fried street food in Padua was unexpected and wonderful. The staff was friendly, the tables clean, I already said everything else I needed to say: highly recommended."

It is considered moderate ($$). This restaurant offers dine-in, and reservation services. It serves lunch, dinner, beer, and wine. 

Opening hours:
 open daily from 12:00 ‚Äì 3:00 PM, 6:30 ‚Äì 11:30 PM.

Phone: 049 956 0981

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-27): "Great selection of fresh vegetables, meats and fish. Delicious authentic Sichuan MaLa Hotpot! This was our fourth time in as many months, and the reliability and consistency is laudable! Not to mention our very friendly and attentive hosts. Highly recommended."
    - (3 stars, 2025-03-15): "We were here for dinner with all you can eat menu. We were 4 people and 3 of us arrived first. We then ordered 3 teas via the tablet. The waitress immediately came to our table and suggested that we took 1 tea first because it'd be in a big teapot, but it turned out the teapot was a normal teapot. We ended up asking for the refills twice and took some drinks available freely in the fridge for people ordering AYCE. We stayed there quite a long time, maybe 2 hours because it'd been a long time we didn't catch up. We didn't ordered much actually although we took AYCE. Before we wrapped our time there, the waitress came and took the tablet indicating that we couldn't order anymore. As I said, we didn't order much. It seemed that they were afraid that we would order too much food and waste food. Well... It wasn't our first time in the AYCE food so we know that there's a fine usually if we can't finish the food. Oh yes, it was mentioned in Chinese at each table that you'll get 5 euro of fine for each 100 gram. So, be careful. When we paid, they miscalculated our bills. It should be 36.2 per person for AYCE menu and they charged us 49 without any explanation. Luckily we checked and complained. We ended up paying the correct price, but there wasn't any apologies from them to admit that they miscalculated something. The foods are okay actually. But with that kinda service, I don't think I will come back again."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-11): "This is best restaurant in Padova to taste traditional Chinese food Hotpot with the best environment. I must mention their dessert items. Finger licking food.Best food with reasonable price. Additionally their service is so special with professional stuff."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-14): "Amazing food! My first hot pot. Went with a Chinese friend and enjoyed a very authentic experience in the middle of Italy!"
    - (4 stars, 2023-10-16): "Came here last minute about a week ago with my boyfriend and a friend, so they were very kind to squeeze us in. We had a bit of hard time finding street parking. There‚Äôs very limited free parking on the street but there‚Äôs a paid parking garage behind the building! We speak very little Italian and got lucky that one of their waitresses spoke very good English. She was able to help us order (2 different ways, through her or the website). She also recommended some great things like the plum juice! It‚Äôs to die for, super refreshing and not too sweet! We did the two broths options and honestly..the bone broth didn‚Äôt have much flavor. It wasn‚Äôt bad, but just not much. They have a great selection of meats and veggies. They also have seafood options as well! Definitely will be coming back to try other broths!"

Reviews:
    - (3 stars, 2025-01-21): "This hotel is situated in the downtown prime location of the city center of Padua. It's very convenient for shopping and dining. The rooms are slightly renovated. I stayed in a twin bed room, and the bed is 2.5", a bit too small. The mattress is firm and comfortable. If the hotel management can work on their bathroom, the stay will be a lot pleasant. The water temperature is not stayable, sometimes it is good, but sometimes either it's too hot, like boiling water, or it's too cold. Besides, I will suggest you bring your own shampoo and shower gel, as the hotel only provides small bags of 2in1 shower gel. If you want extra bags of shampoo and shower gel. The night shift male receptionist is so impolite and unwillingly hand out one extra bag per person. The buffet breakfast is standard European breakfast, it's not bad and if you've a sweet teeth, I strongly recommend you to try their tiramisu, it's good. Restaurant's staff is a lot friender than front desk. *Updated, water pressure and temperature control on the üöø still hasn't improved."
    - (2 stars, 2022-11-14): "Worst experience in Italy, compared with any other hotel in the same price range. 2 nights stay in a deluxe room. Service: some staff employees were really unprofessional. Not giving any information to the guests, the vibe was not nice. Breakfast: really poor, mostly simple cookies. Bad quality ingredients compared with other hotels buffet breakfasts. They were also reducing (almost closing) the service 40 minutes before the closing time. Rooms: they seemed to be good, but maybe 5 years ago. Now they look a bit deteriorated by time. Quite a lot mold in the shower. Location: pretty convenient, the best about this bad experience."
    - (4 stars, 2023-03-23): "This was a great location for where I needed to go. The rooms are comfortable, but the shower door would not open out the way it should have. Breakfast was not great. To many cakes and breads. Not enough vegetables and proteins are available. Plenty of fruit. For a 4-star hotel, I expected the variety to meet all nationalities."
    - (5 stars, 2023-02-05): "Nice hotel close to Padova train station and 5 minutes walking to the posh city center. You can reach easily restaurants, bars and cafes open till late. Amazing continental breakfast with rich tasty coffee and bakeries. Good value for money and you can choose different rooms from the standard double room to the suite with a jacuzzi and drinks included."
    - (5 stars, 2023-05-05): "A nice modern central hotel with welcoming and helpful staff. Situated between the rail station and the old town, and close to the archeological museum. Excellent varied breakfast to start the day. Street parking. Accessible for those with mobility issues."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-10-20): "The food is soooo good! We always take several small things and share them with the whole table. The service is really good and the prices are very good, too! There are a lot of nice spots to sit, and the atmosphere is great."
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-24): "One of the best foods i have ever had in padova Staff is very friendly The environment is amazing The kitchen is visible which is very important to me personally Variety of food is available 10 out of 10"
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-18): "There are a good amount of vegan options here and the food is delicious. One of the best falafels I've ever had. The tea was also great on a cold day. Veggie couscous was also really tasty. Highly recommend!"
    - (4 stars, 2025-06-23): "I had a nice lunch there, their tabule, khofta, and baklava were really good and served rapidly. I would only say the rose beverage was too sweet for me."
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-08): "Mille e Una Notte is a charming dining spot that captures the essence of Middle Eastern and Mediterranean cuisine. The moment you step inside, you're greeted by an inviting ambiance, adorned with beautiful decor that sets the mood for a delightful meal. The mezze platter was a standout, featuring fresh and delicious hummus. For dessert, the baklava was a sweet finish, balancing richness with the right amount of sweetness. While the prices are slightly higher, the quality of food and service makes it well worth it. Mille e Una Notte is perfect for a special occasion or a cozy dinner, and I can't wait to return to explore more of their delightful menu! Highly recommended! Excellent options for vegetarian food *****"

L‚ÄôAntica Pizzeria Da Michele Padova is a restaurant located at Piazza Eremitani, 2, 35121. 
It has an average rating of 4.3 over 5 based on 1339 costumers.
Unfortunately, price is not available. This restaurant offers delivery, dine-in, and reservation services. It serves lunch, dinner, beer, and wine. 
This place is located just 481 meters from Marameo del Diavoletto, 468 meters from Tomba di Lovato dei Lovati and 465 meters from Chiesa dei Santi Canzio, Canziano, Canzianilla e Proto.

Opening hours:
 open daily from 12:00 ‚Äì 3:00 PM, 7:00 ‚Äì 11:30 PM.

Website: http://pro.pns.sm/1op7uqa
Phone: 049 688 4092

Reviews:
    - (4 stars, 2025-02-26): "Authentic Italian Flavors at Da Michele! Tucked away in the charming streets of Padova, Da Michele is a culinary gem that will transport your taste buds to the heart of Italy. This restaurant is a masterclass in traditional Italian cuisine, with dishes that are both simple yet sublime. The atmosphere was okaish, a bit crowded but not over crowded, may be because of weekdays. But the service wasn't upto the mark. The food, oh the food! Each dish was expertly prepared, with fresh ingredients and bold flavors that shone through in every bite. The pizza crust was crispy and golden, and the risotto was creamy and rich. Thr tuna salad was also fresh and delicious. What truly sets Da Michele apart, however, is its commitment to authenticity. This is not a restaurant trying to reinvent the wheel or cater to fleeting trends; rather, it's a testament to the timeless beauty of traditional Italian cooking. The problem that I had was a table charge of 4‚Ç¨. I don't understand what that is and why are we supposed to pay that?"
    - (4 stars, 2025-06-17): "The male server was clearly annoyed by our presence. Up to the point that he refused to give us menus and pointed to a code - very handy while traveling with kids who can read but don't have a phone. And they do have normal menus, we had seen them right at the bar. Luckily a young girl that took over was really friendly. The pizza with burning fire from the previous reviews - our main reason for being there - is no longer served. Instead we got margarita and Sapori Estate, both excellent, really big and served with amazing speed. So, if you want to grab a bite after visiting Scrovegni chapel, it can be an option. Coperta is 2‚Ç¨. For two pizzas and coperta we paid almost 30‚Ç¨."
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-27): "The service is amazing, very nice people/staff, food is excellent , pizzas are big and absolutely delicious. Prices are good and not too expensive for the amount of food you are getting. Very recommended, went there two days in a row and will come back for more. Just amazing!!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-16): "Antica Pizzeria da Michele offers an authentic and beautiful pizzeria experience. The ambiance is simple but inviting, allowing the quality of the food to truly shine. The pizza, made with high-quality ingredients, lived up to its reputation, delivering an unforgettable taste. I'm glad to have experienced such a historic pizzeria, where tradition and flavor come together perfectly.""
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-29): "Authentic, flavorful, best crust ever. A must! Loved every piece of it and I wish I could have more! The staff is amazing and the prices are very good. Really this is one of the best pizza I ever had. Very simple flavors but tasted extremely good."

    - (4 stars, 2025-07-03): "It's nice place to have breakfast, lunch . Services is very good. There is young lady who she is handling everything like an arƒ±m ant. Food was really really surprised to me. Ragu was really ragu which most of the places servicing actually bolognese sauce instead of ragu. I really liked and add to favorites."
    - (4 stars, 2024-10-28): "Didnt stop for food so this might not be the fairest review. Staff were helpful and prompt. Coffee was fine.     - (5 stars, 2024-09-28): "Really nice food, great service. Visited twice when I was in Padua because I liked it so much. Really like the QR code so menu can be translated. Good place to try some Italian pastries. Also had bag hooks which is awesome!"
    - (3 stars, 2024-03-26): "If you can't find anywhere else the food isn't terrible but this is not authentic Italian. It's a chain and I suspect most of the food is prepared at a central place and warmed up. It was no better than Italian food in restaurant chains in the UK. However, the staff were really friendly, and I could not fault them. If it wasn't for them this would have been a 1 star review not a 3."
    - (4 stars, 2024-12-17): "The food was really good, they had both traditional and new dishes. The people is friendly. Good experience overall."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-08): "Really good pizza! The crust was perfect, the toppings were fresh, and everything tasted great. Friendly staff and a nice place to eat. I‚Äôll definitely come back again!"
    - (2 stars, 2025-06-23): "People rating this place either have never tried pizza elsewhere (there are much better places around with even cheaper pizza), or they were asked to write a good review. Anyway, I went there last year and it was full of cockroaches ‚Äî you could see big ones hiding in the corners of the room and small ones everywhere, even on the walls, possibly inside the pizzas as well. This time, I went there hoping they had fixed the problem ‚Äî and indeed, I didn‚Äôt see a single cockroach anywhere. But after eating half of a Margherita pizza, I started feeling very unwell. It was a poor-quality pizza. I‚Äôd assume the dough wasn‚Äôt made with activated yeast or something similar, because the base was completely flat, even at the edges. They also put oregano on the Margherita, which is unusual ‚Äî but that‚Äôs not even the main issue."
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-09): "Very nice place with exceptional pizza üçï. You need to try here 4Formaggi and pizza with porcini (white mushrooms. Perfectly crispy crust, flavorful cheeses, and fresh mushrooms ‚Äì everything was well-balanced. I‚Äôll definitely order again! 100% recommendation!"
    - (5 stars, 2023-09-19): "Arrived soon after opening and already a number of customers served. The staff advised us to patiently wait as a new batch of freshly made pizza was about to go into the oven. Worth the short 5min wait as the pizza is heavenly. Very well priced at ‚Ç¨3.5 for 2 slices. Highly recommended for any hungry travellers."
    - (5 stars, 2020-07-30): "honestly perfect. the pizza dough was just the right thickness to be crunchy yet hold all of the (amazingly flavorful!!!) toppings without comprising its structural integrity. good selection of beers. I'd go here every day if I could -- sadly I was just on a day trip into Padova from Venice. excellent value for money (insane, actually). the man who owns the place is lovely. do yourself a favor and stop here for a pizza. you won't regret it."

Istanbul Pizza e Kebab is a restaurant located at Via Gabriele Falloppio, 10, 35121. 
It has an average rating of 4.3 over 5 based on 378 costumers.
It is considered inexpensive ($). This restaurant offers delivery, dine-in, and reservation services. It serves lunch, dinner, and beer.

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-08): "Food is great, especially meat which is fresh and made well. Restaurant is very clean."
    - (5 stars, 2024-04-07): "Without doubt the best kebap In Padova. The only real Turkish kebap"
    - (4 stars, 2023-02-16): "It's nice place with nice options, since I arrived to Padova. I recently visited restaurant and I have to say that my experience was nothing short of fantastic. The place had a warm and welcoming ambiance, which immediately put me at ease. The staff was friendly and attentive, making sure that my dining experience was as enjoyable as possible. One of the standout features of the restaurant was the incredibly diverse menu. There were so many different options to choose from that it was difficult to decide what to order. From classic appetizers to inventive entrees, there was something for everyone. And the best part? The prices were incredibly fair. Despite the high quality of the food and service, the menu was surprisingly affordable, making it a great option for both casual dining and special occasions. But the real star of the show was the food itself. Every dish that I tried was expertly prepared and bursting with flavor. From the perfectly cooked steak to the fresh and flavorful salads, everything was top-notch. Overall, I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great dining experience. With a welcoming atmosphere, a diverse menu, and fair prices, it's the perfect place for a night out with friends or a special date."
    - (5 stars, 2022-08-05): "5 stars for the Kebab. I would say the best in the town."
    - (5 stars, 2024-07-12): "Good food, good prices, the work hard. Gotta respect. Keep it up, I love the kebab and the falafel!"

There isn't much of a wait but it's definitely worth it! Vote 10"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2021-08-10): "I usually reserve five stars for outstanding restaurants, not take away bars, but I have to make an exception. When the "outstanding" ones are closed in the middle of the day, and the rest serve sandwiches, pasta or pizza, here you will find rescue. 1) Pleasant interior, 2) polite (and goodlooking) service, 3) delicious and fresh ingredients, 4) simple concept of combining vitamins and proteins, 5) ecological packaging - this is a recipe for success. I didn't have time to take a picture because we were diging in!"
    - (5 stars, 2023-07-16): "Great taste, fresh products and ordering via whatsapp was a great plus!!"
    - (5 stars, 2022-04-02): "I haven't tried this place but the owner is my friend! Best poke in town!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-04): "I had a poke with hot sushi rice, teriyaki chicken and caramelized onion (plus a few other ingredients I don't remember), fresh from the pan. I underline this because some people, thinking of pok√® as an essentially cold dish, don't eat it in winter. However, it also works hot. I like the combination I tried. Overall, while it's not something radically different from the other Pok√® out there, I'd say it's the best I've tried."
    - (5 stars, 2023-03-23): "Now I think it's the tenth time I've ordered here, in the space of more than a year. Being a takeaway I've never taken five minutes for a review but I think it's a must. As far as I'm concerned it's the best poke in Padua. I've tried several, but none offer the same combinations as this restaurant. In general, all the ingredients are of high quality, but the Tropea onion is worthy of note, as it is very sweet. The rice is in the right proportion with the other ingredients and is cooked to perfection, plus it is always very moist. The availability of being able to have tuna/salmon seared or in a sesame crust is a huge plus for me. In short, quality ingredients and very tasty poke. Of course the prices are not very low, but for the quality offered it is fine. Top!"

    - (5 stars, 2025-06-01): "We had dinner at Osteria La Sofia, and the food was absolutely outstanding. Every dish we tried was excellent, and it ended up being one of the best meals we had during our stay in Padua. Special mention to the baccal√† mantecato, which was excellent. That said, the service left quite a bit to be desired. There was only one waiter trying to manage the entire dining room, rushing around to serve all the customers. On several occasions, we asked for things that never arrived. While we completely understand the situation given the volume of work, it did take away from what could have been a truly exceptional experience. Nevertheless, we‚Äôd absolutely come back and would still recommend it, just come with a bit of patience!"
    - (4 stars, 2022-04-22): "The best: environment and food. The service is friendly but can be a bit slow though. I tried the risotto that was really good for me, it has a strong cheese.     - (5 stars, 2024-08-04): "Wonderful place to eat classic food from the region from high quality ingredients and experienced chefs."

Reviews:
    - (4 stars, 2025-03-20): "Kind staff, good food, nice atmosphere"
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-05): "In the center of Padova you find a trendy restaurant PePen where you enjoy a good Italian food in a nice atmosphere!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-01): "Amazing place, good food, √Æn the heart of padova."
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-02): "The Pepen restaurant in Padua, now under new management for a few months, presents itself as a completely renovated and very well-kept place. I used to go there often for lunch, when it was more of a pizzeria, but now it has become a high-end restaurant where you can taste some traditional Paduan cuisine dishes along with more refined options. Among the appetizers, I particularly appreciate the Venetian cured meats accompanied by Morgan's giardiniera, always very fresh and tasty. Among the first courses, the square spaghetti with raw scampi is an original and truly tasty choice. Moving on to the second courses, I highly recommend the baked amberjack or the Florentine steak, both of excellent quality. However, I find that the side dishes have a somewhat limited choice and could be improved. As for desserts, the collaboration with the Racca pastry shop is a guarantee: I particularly recommend the dark chocolate mousse, simply delicious. The wine list is also well-stocked and of a high standard. A tip: book, especially on weekends, because waiting times can be long. It is true that the prices are higher than average, but considering the central location, the trendy and refined atmosphere, and the overall quality of the offer, I think they are justified."
    - (3 stars, 2024-03-30): "Me and two other friends had dinner at this historic restaurant in Padua under new management. Very well-kept and modern atmosphere. Good service, unfortunately the first impression was not the best since we were served the chef's entr√©es and appetizers all together. The rest of the service was good. The menu is made up of traditional dishes revisited in a modern way. Average portions, very tasty appetizers (we had the beef tartare, the courgette flowers and the tentacle), while the first courses did not fully satisfy us (chitarrina and linguine) because not only were they lacking in salt but also because the ingredients were disconnected from each other and there was a very strong lemon note that covered everything. Good desserts (cheesecake and chocolate salami). With a bottle of wine we spent just under ‚Ç¨50 per person so the price was average."

However, the wine portion was quite small, more suited for tasting. On the bright side, they were generous with complimentary snacks like chips and small focaccia. It would be better if the wine portion was slightly larger."
    - (5 stars, 2024-02-29): "Had an amazing dinner here with my husband and one-year-old! They were very friendly and accommodating and we were able to enjoy a nice dinner out with our baby. The food was amazing!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-02-21): "Beautiful meals and wine, friendly service and clean premises. A nice place for an excellent meal stop."
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-11): "Enoteca Santa Lucia is a true gem in the heart of Padua, perfect for those who love good drinks and quality cuisine. The location is splendid, with a refined and elegant interior and a pleasant outdoor area that overlooks the suggestive Piazza Cavour, giving a unique atmosphere. The service is impeccable: the staff is professional, attentive and always ready to advise with competence. The cocktails are really well made, balanced and refined, while the selection of wines is wide and of great quality, with labels perfect for every occasion. The fish cuisine is a pleasant discovery, with fresh and refined dishes that enhance the raw materials. An address not to be missed for those looking for a high-level food and wine experience in the historic center of Padua."
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-09): "Some time ago we went to this place and were certainly satisfied üëç. Then we finally moved on to the Anima Nera ‚ö´ to sweeten the palate. In the meantime, also two bottles of sparkling water üíß and a small plate of fresh fruit üçâüçëü•ùüçì with cream. All staff members are kind and professional üßëüèªüë©üèª; in this sense, special thanks certainly go to the manager üë®üèª‚Äçü¶± of the structure, an exquisite person who treated us with the utmost respect throughout our stay. Finally, the venue itself is amazing, as is the interior furnishings; the external window ü™ü is completely illuminated üí° by hanging filaments, if they can be defined as such, which create an absolutely suggestive effect. But the real highlight of the place is in the rooms on the lower floor; the same ones, simple but very refined, were literally carved out of the bare rock ü™® of the old "underground Padua". Finally, soft lighting ü™î and a peculiar display of vintage wines üçæ do the rest. We liked it so I RECOMMEND IT üëç, but you don't even need to specify it.     - (5 stars, 2025-05-12): "Our dinner at Zafferano was nothing short of extraordinary ‚Äì easily deserving two Michelin stars. The restaurant specializes in fish and seafood, and everything we tasted was prepared with absolute precision and artistry. We started with a stunning appetizer: tiny shrimp from the lagoon, fried whole and served over creamy polenta with a delicate cod mousse made with milk and cream. Then came a beautifully plated octopus dish with razor clams and a fresh young artichoke salad ‚Äì a perfect balance of texture and flavor. The grand finale: spaghetti cacio e pepe with scampi ‚Äì a dish so rich and refined, it left a lasting impression. This is not a tourist trap, but a place where you experience Italian cuisine at its finest, made for those who truly appreciate top-level cooking. Service was impeccable, the wine pairing spot on, and every detail of the evening felt carefully curated. Zafferano isn‚Äôt just a dinner spot ‚Äì it‚Äôs a world-class dining experience."
    - (5 stars, 2024-06-11): "The restaurant is situated opposite an hotel and would be missed if we didn‚Äôt know it was there. The food was outstanding and the service was excellent. I was amazed at the tiny mark-up on the lovely wines on the menu. A great new find for me!"

    - (5 stars, 2023-01-09): "The best mensa in Padova! Very large variety of food and it changes everyday! Including vegetarian and vegan options Highly recommend to dine in at least once"
    - (5 stars, 2017-02-03): "Best canteen ever. Open time: Mon-Fri 11.45AM-2.30PM. Menu is changed everyday (you can check the menu on esupd.gov.it). Food is so good. Free water, coca and some other kinds of soft drink."
    - (4 stars, 2022-02-18): "The best mensa or canteen in Padova only IF you go on Fridays. They went all out on Fridays and as a result, you could get some of the best lunch menus! For this week (Feb 18th) they served a superb spaghetti with clams and also a nice pork with prosciutto crudo and baked mozzarella. It was really nice! If you're allergic, you can also ask them for gluten-free pasta. Just say it to them and they'll make it fresh for you. It is the only mensa which has beer and a LOT of beverage choices to accompany your meal. To make it even better, they also serve a real dessert instead of just the instant or pre-packaged ones. However, I still give them 4 stars only because they don't have acqua naturale/mineral water and we need to go outside to get our dessert. Furthermore, we also need to sit down under shabby tents to enjoy it. Maybe it feels nice during spring or summer, but in winter... nah. And even though they apply strict health protocols inside, the way they arrange the seat outside clearly not for someone who has paranoia towards covid.
