Reviews:
    - (2 stars, 2024-10-27): "The drinks are fine however a bit overpriced. The service is zero. The stuff was more than unpleasant. Not very nice experience. By the way a waiter is cute guy."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-22): "Best lasagna I've had. Nice and warm. Don't listen to the other reviews"
    - (5 stars, 2024-06-22): "Came here for a quick drink before dinner. The ambience and small plates are satisfying."
    - (3 stars, 2024-10-23): "Service was very uncomfortable and lowkey rude. The server was really annoyed that we didn‚Äôt speak Italian. He ignored us while taking our order, looked away while we where talking & didn‚Äôt even try to understand us.. the order was wrong but we didn‚Äôt make a problem of it, because of the way he behaved. Afterwards, he approached the table for the bill, but like he just stood there without saying anything? We where really confused about it. The food and location are great, but we will not be coming back here"
    - (4 stars, 2024-09-14): "especially known for its spritz cocktails and a variety of tramezzini (Italian sandwiches), making it a great place for an aperitif or a light meal. Little bit pricey (compared to other cafes/bistro in Padova). For instance, spritz 5 euro, glass of wine Lugana DOC 5 euro. But it‚Äôs a great experience"

Website: https://brunchrepublic.com/
Phone: 049 501 5689

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-04): "We had a fantastic experience at Brunch Republic in Padua. The atmosphere was modern and inviting, making it a great spot to enjoy a relaxed meal with friends. We ordered the Eggs & Bacon, along with filtered coffee and a Energy Red smoothie, and everything was delicious. The ingredients were fresh, and the flavors were perfectly balanced. The service was friendly and efficient, adding to the overall great experience. Plus, the prices were very reasonable for the quality of food and service. I highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a great brunch in Padua."
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-28): "Best place for brunch in Padova! The egg Benedict‚Äôs and the pancakes are a must, they got really good coffee and service is amazing!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-31): "Came twice on holiday this week (might return again). Shocking that this currently "only" has 4.0 stars. The wait staff are brilliant (even to us Brits), friendly and patient. The establishment sits in a nice shaded area away from the blistering sun while the inside is cutesy but modern. The wait times are decent, even when busy, and the food... The food is special. Classic continental brunch dishes with just a tweak of character, cooked perfectly. ... Utterly delicious. Personally, I preferred my first Sweet & Salty French Toast choice to my return Bacon Benedict, but both were delicious, and all the other table items looked so, too."
    - (5 stars, 2023-10-29): "Simply delicious. Brunch republic in Padova offers a wide range of food, spacing from pancakes to Burger and it does it with a touch of originality so difficult to find it in a restaurant. The menu Is rich, and it's very easy to find plates that you're gonna love! As for the salmon dance brunch, for example: A plate composed of salmon, avocado, beetroot hummus, eggs, bread, dried tomatoes, and salad, which I recommend you to try. Or the Vegan burger: a delicious alternative to the meat one. The Hot lattes and the Juices are extremely delicious and taste balanced, and the descriptions sound so nice, that you want to try them all ( and they are worth it ). And the restaurant has a plus: the incredible customer service. Carlos, one of the waiters, is such a wonderful and funny person, who transmit positive energy and that created an amazing environment around him. The staff was in symbiosis between them, and that was reflected on the service; it was extremely efficient and pleasant - definitely one of the best I ever got in Padova. Why do I say that? It was the first time I saw the clients go away with a big smile and only after having said bye to Carlos and all the other amazing members of the staff. When you have a good team, you have a good restaurant! (And a full one I'd say) Try "Brunch republic" and you are not gonna repent!"
    - (2 stars, 2025-05-01): "We went on Saturday without a reservation, and right from the start, the atmosphere felt a bit tense. the staff questioned us quite abruptly about not having a reservation. We politely responded that it wasn‚Äôt a problem we could easily go elsewhere. Eventually, he told us a table was available, and we were seated, expecting a third person to join us later. Unfortunately, service was extremely slow. It took about 20 minutes before anyone came to take our order, and then another 45 minutes for the food to arrive. The food itself tasted good, though the coffee was completely cold by the time it reached us Our third guest arrived about half an hour later, and we were ready to place another order. But after waiting another 30 minutes without any attention, we decided to leave and go somewhere else"

Reviews:
    - (4 stars, 2025-07-05): "Staff are very helpful on reception, great location Breakfast area busy and a little slow to clean tables so may need to wait for one"
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-12): "Book a room with a view of the Basilica of St Anthony. It's a seven star location. The rooms are a little 20th century but the staff are lovely."
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-11): "Visiting University of Padova for the month and staying in this hotel. Very nice location right next to rhe university and the Basilica. Room is very clean and quiet. Breakfast is pretty decent. Staff members are very friendly. It's been a great experience!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-27): "Excellent location. Good breakfast Staff very friendly and most helpful. Highly recommend"
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-28): "It was very short stay in Padova. Only 2 days one of them we use to visit Venice. Of course we would like to come back to see Padova in more details. Location of the hotel was great everywhere 5-10 minutes walk. Just one step to Cathedral that make your feel magnifical. Even to train station you can walk something around 20 minutes. Breakfast, personal, restaurant infront of hotel everything was very good. Room was the best during our 14 days travel in Italy. Family room with two bedrooms and very sweet interior design. Sound insulation, cleanliness, comfort all the great. I can't find really any problem. But the best was signor at the reception made jokes and helped with any information. Thanks to him to make our days smily. It can be kettle in room we like to drink some hot tea in cold evenings."

    - (5 stars, 2024-05-10): "Really nice restaurant located on charming small square. Lots of tables inside and few outside. We tried Bigoli del Nonna and it was brilliant! Good house wine. Absolutely worth a visit."

    - (5 stars, 2024-08-21): "The food was absolutely delicious!! The pizzas we had were incredibly good, especially after a long day of travelling around Padova. The desserts were just as good, definitely recommend the Torta della Nonna!!! The atmosphere was also quite cosy and nice, and the service was very friendly and super approachable!! Highly, highly recommended"
    - (4 stars, 2025-04-23): "Pizza was very good the salads we ok (tomatoes weren‚Äôt that fresh) service excellent Soda 4 euros??? A bit too much"
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-24): "Very friendly service, fantastic pizza, and the best Catalan cream I‚Äôve ever had"
    - (5 stars, 2024-04-19): "Nice pizzeria with great pizzas, very good tirami su, a good house wine, friendly service and very reasonable prices. We went as a family, and felt very welcomed. The ordering was fast, and the food was at the table in a couple of minutes. The pizzas were crispy and delicious. They have Italian beer - the IPA was very tasty. As a house wine they serve a regional Merlot di Veneto by the glass. They also have tables outside by the road but with a view on the basilica St. Antonius. We can only recommend this place - best reserve a table ahead."
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-12): "Excellent pizza & friendly service. The place is popular with locals, even though it is right next to the tourist area/cathedral. Absolutely recommended!"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-24): "Me and my husband have been here twice and both times the food and service were excellent. We had the bigoli, tris di mare and the risotto, and I highly recommend the risotto. The wine selection is good and the prices are reasonable too. Their pazientina is the best I have ever tried."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-07): "A very nice restaurant that is a little more upscale and closer to fine dining in Padova. The food here while smaller in portion was excellent. I recommend the spaghetti with urchin, it was absolutely delicious. The eggplant tart was also very well made and tasty. The servers were very good and helpful. One even offered to keep my partners wine on ice and came by regularly to make sure his glass was kept full."
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-12): "Located "off the tourist radar" on a narrow street in old Padua, I consider it to be an unimposing authentic very good Italian restaurant. Open for luncheon and dinner, for the latter to avoid disappointment I would highly recommend you make a reservation. The kitchen is top, daily fresh produce from the local market are selected, and creatively prepared. This establishment ticks all the boxes for a very good restaurant dining experience; small rotating seasonal menu, moderate prices, it opens just for lunch and then closes and reopens for dinner, large enough for seating up to 40 persons, but small enough to ensure food quality and service always deliver an unforgettable experience. I would recommend a visit, you will not be disappointed."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-20): "My dad and I tried a few dishes and everything was just delicious. I would definitely recommend to try the ‚Äúfrittura mista‚Äù - it‚Äôs amazing!! The atmosphere is also really lovely and the staff very kind and friendly."
    - (5 stars, 2022-10-18): "Service 10/10 the waiter name is Antoine. Great service and great manners. Food 9/10 The beef tartare (battuta cruda di manzo) was fabulous. They helped to divide the portion for me and my husband. The spaghettoni with sea urchin were great too. The Tuna had a nice spice twist to it. The dessert( pazientina padovana) was very nice however, based on my personal opinion, a little too much alcohol for it. Please do note that I don't drink that much and zabaione cream need to have alcohol inside but, for my personal taste as a closings plate, there was a little too much of it. But I repeat, is just my opinion coming from an Asian prospective. My Italian husband loved it. Atmosphere 10/10 Great music and the happy atmosphere between the service made it awesome! Please please please if you have the opportunity do visit this restaurant(opened in 1934). It is really worth a visit ‚ù§Ô∏èüòä."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-06): "Excellent meal. The Sirloin Heifer was cooked to perfection. The saut√©ed artichokes were the perfect touch! Tempura Prawns were perfect, nice & crunchy with that accompanying sauce. This was the most beautiful & unique dining experience. The outside dining area is literally a garden surrounded by 2 small rivers that meet each other at the end of the property. The staff was excellent & spoke perfect English. The young lady who waited on us was amazing!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-27): "The service here is excellent, and far better than any other place I‚Äôve been to in Italy. It is also very nice that the whole of the staff speak English very well. Now to the more important matters: the food is excellent, starting with the house bread which is fresh and tasty. The crudites that come here are really good too - seemed to be tomato flavoured! For starters, we got the beetroot carpaccio. This was really well done - the beetroot very soft and the topping worked very well (particularly the blue cheese, which normally I severely dislike). What I found a bit too much was the sweetness of the grape musk! The mains were good too. The sirloin was well done and the dressing was nice and bold. The seafood for the platter was very fresh. My dish was the octopus. I liked it quite a bit though I tasted a bit too much of burning from the grilling on it. I would really recommend this place despite the nits above. Of particular interest may be the tasting menu. In my case the party I was with restricted my choices a bit. The menu is very interesting across the board, and it definitely feels like lots if care and thought has gone into crafting every dish."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-23): "Great place. Staff was pleasant and spoke English very well. We really enjoyed the meal!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-13): "Hidden gem foodie gem in Padova ü•óü•£üçùüç∑ Great selection of food traditional Italien food with a little touch to it. The courtyard is amazing fell like somewhere tropical üå¥üíê"
    - (4 stars, 2025-05-17): "Don't come here if you are hungry. Come for ambiance and experience. The food is fancy, well cooked, and well presented. But the portions are tiny."

I ask Fantone Gianni Kenton, the manager, to send the dish back and he replies: "Womp womp, you're a pepega". I don't know what he meant; but then I got a pizza which was very good üòãü§§. Spent little because there is the possibility of paying in alternative ways üòèüòâ"
    - (4 stars, 2025-02-16): "The staff were very helpful even though I showed up after closing time. They gave me some leftover salami from a lady which was really, really good. I will definitely come back.‚ò∫Ô∏è"
    - (4 stars, 2025-02-09): "Went with my mother and daughter. Fun experience for everyone. Despite the malfunctioning fryer, they managed to prepare some splendid dishes for us."

    - (5 stars, 2023-10-12): "Bruno's was amazing. The staff is super friendly and attentive. The ambience is relaxed and chill, a refugee in the city heart."
    - (4 stars, 2025-01-04): "The staff is nice and the place is okay. I personally didn't like the first and second I ordered. But my husband was happy with both the Bigoti al rag√π d'anatra and the Baccal√† alla vicentina."
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-04): "We went here for lunch based on reviews on Google maps and we were right. There weren't many people here in the middle of the day. Very nice place, dishes with delicate taste, high quality ingredients. Good service, reasonable prices. If I am in Padua, I'll come here again. We had the Spaghetti al nero di seppia and Gnocchetti di palate con ragu di pesce, I highly recommend them."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-04): "The place with a very fresh fish and seafood, excellent service, personal approach and care. We have visited the restaurant twice during our stay in Padova and we have enjoyed it on both occasions."
    - (5 stars, 2024-03-31): "Such a gem just a 10 minute walk from the center of Padova. The staff were extremely knowledgeable about the food and wine and generally very welcoming. We tried the octopus salad, seafood spaghetti, fish and tiramisu and all of these were absolutely delicious. The restaurant has a cosy and romantic feel to it - I would recommend booking though as I saw many couples turned away due to it being full."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2023-03-27): "If you like mussels than this is the place for you. Charming little place with a very friendly owner. The mussels were of the best quality and it was fun to try them prepared with different sauces. We also enjoyed the croquettes. Street parking is available in front"
    - (4 stars, 2023-01-19): "Super cute place, great vibe."
    - (4 stars, 2022-09-06): "Good mussels but other food on offer too."
    - (4 stars, 2025-06-13): "We ate mussels from Palestrina, tasty, well cooked, adequate and satisfying portions, available in various versions. In addition to the mussels, there were some first courses, a few side dishes and some appetizers. We tried the panelle, potatoes, pepper and lemon, the grilled aubergines with chimichurri were highly recommended (even if they were few). For two, with a portion of mussels each, 1 shared appetizer, 2 glasses of wine and water, we spent ‚Ç¨60 in total. We appreciated the welcome with a hard-boiled egg and zibibbo."
    - (5 stars, 2023-09-01): "Cozzeria Nice and familiar Bistrot in the center of Padua. You can taste Pellestrina mussels, excellently prepared and accompanied to the table by Rachele, who, being a refined sommelier, can admirably advise on the choice of wines. We had mussels au gratin, pasta cacio pepe and mussels and mussels with garlic. Congratulations indeed. I will definitely return"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-04-18): "Ristorante Ariston is a casual restaurant with good food to decent prices. The pasta (gnocchi bolognese) was hot and tasted great. The swordfish carpaccio (smoked, not raw) was good - nothing fancy. Put vinegar, oil and salt&pepper over the salad. The torta de la Nonna was also ok. Unfortunately, they didn't have tiramisu anymore. They also habe pizza. The service was really very friendly and fast, and the athmosphere was very nice - real Italian. There were no other tourists - we were the only foreigners. I can recommend Ariston if you want a real Italian and casual restaurant with good food (nothing fancy) and decent prices."
    - (5 stars, 2022-05-22): "A great restaurant close to the centre of Padua (near the hospital area) with all the classics, prepared traditionally and available late into the evenings. Being rather gifted in the appetite department (honestly, I had a long journey, ok), I went for a double main: lasagna bolognese and Siciliano pizza. Both very extremely clean yet rich in flavour. Great ambiance, tentative staff, and good value for money. Highly recommend! Pro tip: takeaway options available but I didn‚Äôt explore that."
    - (2 stars, 2023-10-30): "Visited for inch it was 3 of us. The place is very pleasant looking and clean. Unfortunately the service was extremely disappointing. Our waiter was not inviting and made us feel very unwelcome. He was very friendly to the other tables around us and brought them bread and breadsticks while coming to check on them. He did not do the same for us. It took forever to get the check. If you are a tourist I would suggest you bypass this place. Many other places in the city which are welcoming and have good food."
    - (5 stars, 2023-05-02): "They have a fantastic service (I come back 2 times) and a good food and wine for fair price"
    - (3 stars, 2023-08-06): "The food is not bad but for the price a bit small for my liking. Also, the pizza was, in my opinion, too thin to the point where all the ingredients would just slide right off it. Also, be aware cause there is a hidden cost called coperto. It's essentially payment for all the tables, glasses, and silverware used while you were eating there."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-30): "In short, the best place for a high-quality, good-price quick lunch, breakfast or afternoon coffee. Very few places on Earth can proudly bear a name that describes with extreme accuracy their effect on their visitors. This is one of them, and perhaps the finest examples I've ever found. Let me explain. They offer a good variety of exquisite dishes for lunch (mostly primi piatti, with some secondi), with a constantly rotating selection of options (really, the offerings change every day) and great new additions regularly. Their sweets, either small or big, are amazing and ideal for the morning or afternoon. I highly recommend their Pazientina and the Caff√© Mousse dolcetto (yes, that little chocolate mug). They can always be washed down with their good coffee. The staff is quick, efficient, gentle and always in good mood. The prices are low given the quality of the food and average before taking that into account. Every visit will fill your stomach, excite every single sensitive cell in your tongue and nose and feel in your soul like the kiss of a fine lady, i.e. like a Bacio di Dama."
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-04): "Excellent selection of pastries, cozy atmosphere and friendly staff. What's not to like?"
    - (5 stars, 2024-12-20): "I had a great experience at this cafe! Every time I go, I am always impressed by the quality of the products offered. There are options for every taste, whether it's coffee, desserts or snacks. In addition, the atmosphere of the cafe is cozy and relaxing. . The staff is always friendly and helpful, contributing to a very positive overall experience. If you are looking for a place to enjoy great food and high-quality drinks, I highly recommend you to stop by this cafe. You will not be disappointed!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-16): "I really like this place, they are kind, the sweets and also the savoury ones are good, and for a quick lunch it's great. I recommend it ‚ô•Ô∏è"
    - (5 stars, 2024-12-16): "I tried Bacio di Dama for a business lunch and I was pleasantly surprised! The atmosphere is welcoming and the staff is very kind and fast. The menu offers a wide choice of dishes, all prepared with fresh and quality ingredients. I tried the fresh homemade gnocchi with beetroot and they were simply delicious! The desserts, then, are a real temptation: soft and delicious, perfect to end the meal in style. If you are looking for a place to enjoy genuine cuisine and impeccable service, Bacio di Dama is the place for you."

    - (4 stars, 2024-09-20): "The best: good prices and good food. I was totally surprised by this place. Seems that they even offer healthy food which is very difficult to find.     - (5 stars, 2025-05-10): "Since the change of management, P&G has now been our favorite bar for an aperitif! The cacio e pepe meatballs and the cicchetti are delicious, always with the freshest ingredients and prepared by the chef. I highly recommend trying their Blanc beer!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-06-24): "I was really impressed. The atmosphere is welcoming and the staff is friendly and helpful. The strong point of the place is undoubtedly the cuisine. (Extraordinary fish)"
    - (5 stars, 2024-05-23): "I had heard about the change in management (formerly Panzerotto) and I went for lunch today out of curiosity. Renovated place compared to the previous management, informal and pleasant. I ate a really good cacio e pepe pasta, I then tasted a simple but still good side dish and concluded with an excellent mascarpone cup! For those who perhaps have little time during their lunch break, they offer "combo" menus where you can choose between a first course, a second course and a side dish. I will definitely be back in the evening to try the burgers. The staff were friendly and helpful, completing a really positive experience. Five stars so far deserved! I can't wait to return"
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-01): "Super recommended! The place is very welcoming and has excellent quality food. The staff is particularly helpful and kind. We always come for their aperitif promo which includes delicious cicchetti. Also highly recommended for graduation parties"

    - (5 stars, 2025-02-05): "Hidden gem restaurant, with a beautiful, classy interior, kind and assisting staff, and some of the best food I have ever had. If you are visiting or living in Padova, you must try Magnolie Mulan."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-04): "Very nice relaxing atmosphere for Sunday lunch. All you can eat served at the table is good value and the food is mostly very good."
    - (4 stars, 2025-03-27): "They serve nice big portions so order accordingly!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-07): "Good quality, kind and friendly staff, most of them speak English perfectly. The place was cozy and lovely, full of trees and plants. It is crowded on Friday nights, hopefully we had a reservation. Sushi is done fast."
    - (2 stars, 2023-08-24): "I guess most people go there for the all you can eat but we had requested a la carte. We had to wait almost 10 minutes before someone provided us with the menu. The ramen was really good, but the portions of the dumplings were quite inadequate for the price (3 for 5‚Ç¨). But the dumplings were really good! Then we ordered fried duck in salt and pepper and again, it was extremely small in portion compared to the price (6 bite sized pieces for 8‚Ç¨). We were really disappointed with the quality of the dish as well. It was quite crowded in the evening and perhaps that affected the service and the quality. Overall, we were disappointed with the experience."

Reviews:
    - (4 stars, 2024-10-11): "Crossing Da Pippo's door is a bit like entering a time warp. I was welcomed by the typical decor I was used to when going to local restaurants with my parents as a child. Everything seems to be straight out of a flashback. Including the menu, in a very positive way. You find dishes that have been in the traditional Paduan cuisine for decades. Everything prepared with care, resulting in excellent quality. And all that at more than decent prices, which is an added bonus not found in other restaurants."
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-18): "I love finding these hole in the wall places, and this restaurant was excellent! Unpretentious, delicious food with generous wine pours served with a smile."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-29): "I have been going to Tsukiyo Dojo for almost two years and I couldn't be more satisfied. The instructor, Louis, is extremely knowledgeable, the group is close-knit and the environment is welcoming even for those who, like me, started as a complete beginner. The school is excellent for both adults and children who want to approach Ninjutsu in a serious and accessible way. Come and visit us, we are waiting for you ‚ô•Ô∏è"
    - (5 stars, 2024-12-18): "I am very happy to share my experience with Tsukiyo Dojo. From the first day I felt welcomed into a real family of ninjutsu enthusiasts. Master Louis is extremely competent and knows how to convey his passion in an engaging way. The lessons are always stimulating and varied, ranging from combat technique to the philosophy behind this ancient martial art. The other students are fantastic people, always available to collaborate and support each other. If you are looking for an authentic experience and a friendly environment to practice ninjutsu, this is the gym for you!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-18): "I approached this dojo a year ago, and I immediately found myself at ease with the group that frequents it, made up of very nice and friendly people. The master is very knowledgeable and always available, demonstrating on every occasion the passion and dedication he puts into teaching this ancient art. I recommend the experience to every fan of martial arts and Japanese culture."
    - (5 stars, 2020-02-02): "Complete and authentic martial art passed down for centuries to this day. The Dojo is a serene and peaceful environment in which to practice. The master, together with his techniques, manages to convey to you all his passion for art. Recommended for anyone looking for authentic discipline."
    - (5 stars, 2020-01-31): "This Dojo is a rare pearl. The martial art taught, Ninjutsu, is authentic, alive, extremely effective and fascinating. Rocco - known as Louis - the Shidoshi, is a great person: with honesty and humility he always manages to instill a positive, constructive and serene climate inside and outside the Dojo. To him the true Art was shown. For those who live in the province of Padua but also in Veneto and surrounding areas, it is really worth following it, which is also possible thanks to the monthly lessons for those away from home."

    - (5 stars, 2025-04-12): "Excellent menus in both the restaurant and the pizzeria... the main dish is the tartar... the dishes are all plentiful... in the summer you dine by the pool in a unique location! ..prices in my opinion lower than the market ones!"

    - (5 stars, 2022-10-31): "The location is unique, a green lung 1 km from the center of Padua, with two beautiful rooms overlooking the tennis or swimming pool, as well as a well-sheltered terrace that can also be used in the cold months.     - (1 stars, 2022-05-22): "30th birthday party. Dinner by the pool, whose menu included various appetizers and a first course. All courses were served extremely slowly, despite having been requested several times for a faster and more efficient service. Particularly painful note: the attitude of the owner, surly and arrogant. Last but not least: to use the space in front of the swimming pool, we were required to have a lifeguard, with consequent additional cost. Cost, however, absolutely not justified, since it was never there throughout the evening. Total disappointment, experience not to be repeated!"

    - (3 stars, 2023-11-29): "The place is old, and requires some proper refurbishment. Food is average. The staff, however, is nice and kind. That said, there are many other places which are better both in the city center and outside."

And after they gave us the menu the waiter came back after 1 minute ready to take the order! The feeling was like "order,eat and go away". This is the kind of behavior that piss me off a lot! If your pizzeria has lots of free tables, you should sit people where they want and treat them as real customers, not just people that "brings in money"!!!! :/"

    - (5 stars, 2025-06-10): "I took the China trio to take away, spring rolls (not very filling but good and big), Cantonese rice (very good and plentiful) and sweet and sour beef. I had a great time, the lady was kind, the service was fast and the food was good and plentiful! Price ‚Ç¨10.50"
    - (1 stars, 2025-02-13): "I ordered takeaway and when I went to collect my shoes they were sticking to the floor, so I would say 0 cleanliness. Apart from this, when I arrived home to eat what I had ordered I was very disappointed (taking into account that I hadn't been here for several years): the quality had worsened a lot and the prices were decidedly excessive, taking into account the poor quality of the dishes. Spring rolls: filled only with hood Salt and pepper prawns: old and smelly. Algae: inedible. Chicken in sweet and sour sauce: There was more veg than chicken. Spicy soy noodles and steamed meat dumplings: the only decent and edible things. ‚Ç¨34 to digest 1/4 of dinner seems excessive to me. Never again"
    - (4 stars, 2020-05-07): "Kind and helpful. Thai with limited choice but very good. Sushi good beyond my expectations. Abundant fish and really well done rice. A very varied menu. For every ‚Ç¨20 you get a free soft drink or 66 beer. Not bad I'd say. Home delivery within a 5 km radius for 3 euros."
    - (5 stars, 2022-09-30): "I spent ‚Ç¨15 for two China Tris, a moderate wait and everything served hot. Excellent quality and very friendly staff. I'm happy to have had dinner here, it was enough for 4 people. Post covid the prices have increased slightly but it's worth it."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-12-24): "What a fine dining experience! The waiters are super friendly and the chefs have taken the regional products to the highest level. We loved the the baccala tacos, the super fresh CCCC and the seafood based pastas. All this while the ambiance is still very casual at the long shared tables. We also loved watching the action in the kitchen. What a great find in Padovaüëå We will be back!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-10): "Super super super!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-21): "I went to Anna's restaurant for the Easter Monday celebrations and it was a truly pleasant experience. The staff was super friendly and attentive to every need, making us feel at ease straight away. We ate very well, well prepared and super tasty dishes. Applause also goes to the solidarity initiative, promoted by the restaurant, in which they gave space to local associations, this one was in favor of the Rubano Kennel, a truly beautiful gesture that makes the experience even more special. Super recommended, thank you"
    - (4 stars, 2025-01-19): "Almost perfect. Two gaps: the intestine was present in the scampi and raw prawns. Wine list with the possibility of improvement and an almost non-existent offer of liqueurs or bitters. However, we ate well and will be happy to return. We really appreciated the service from the guy in the room, very professional."
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-14): "We had the pleasure of tasting dishes in which the aesthetic details were carefully curated, creating a visual harmony that beautifully anticipated the taste experience. Each course was able to surprise with its balance, creativity and quality of raw materials, leaving us with an indelible memory of the place and its welcoming atmosphere. A heartfelt applause to the kitchen for the mastery and passion that shine through in every dish, and a thank you to the attentive and discreet waiting staff. Without a doubt, we will return."

Reviews:
    - (3 stars, 2021-08-11): "Nice place but very spartan, like a festival so to speak, but the prices are more suitable for a restaurant with comfortable chairs, tables with covers and waiter at the table (which are missing here). The food is good and of good quality but for the drinks terrible service and very high prices. Had a nice evening with friends but I don't know if we'll be back."
    - (3 stars, 2021-09-14): "Very nice for an evening with friends! The lighting is certainly the most particular part of these kiosks. There is a nice musical background and the staff is young and kind, it's a shame we discovered it when the season was almost over, I hope they'll do it again next year!! The only flaw is that I find the prices a little high (spritz 4 euros???)."
    - (3 stars, 2021-08-07): "Very nice location, varied and good dishes. Not very organized when ordering drinks. It's crazy that they only sell water in 33 cans and that they don't separate waste collection. Improved."
    - (5 stars, 2021-08-12): "Beautiful evening, perfect organization and food. The lights are fantastic and make the atmosphere "magical"."
    - (2 stars, 2021-09-07): "We went on a summer evening to do something different. The welcome from the guys is very good, the problem arises in booking your dish. Very complicated and if you want table service you have to leave your email, telephone number and pay by credit card, otherwise you have no service in cash, you have to get up to get everything and you still have to leave your telephone number. The prices are very high, as confirmed by several people present, for example 1 can of 33cl still water costs ‚Ç¨1.50 compared to the normal rate throughout Padua, a half-litre bottle costs 1 euro. Same thing for food prices."

The food is nothing special, just simple homemade foods like cooked by your grandparents ( for this reason you can really not complain about it.....Will you complain about grandparents food? You just eat it ü§£) And the price is just way more than fair -- 5‚Ç¨ for a pasta and 1.5‚Ç¨ for cappuccino? A price of a restaurant in the 20th century.     - (5 stars, 2024-07-05): "A small restaurant with very good food cooked like my granny."
    - (1 stars, 2022-11-08): "Stopped here for lunch, miserable waitress who served us couldn‚Äôt have been more unhelpful if she‚Äôd tried said we couldn‚Äôt have soup & pasta as they were both `first course`. In a rush we choose pasta and a second course of a pork chop. It didn‚Äôt come with veg and she didnt think to try to ask. And so,it arrived `just a pork chop`. Very odd, even at that point she didnt ask if we wanted any veg. We also noticed that everyone else appeared to have bread with their food and we were not given any or offered any."
    - (5 stars, 2024-02-19): "Real Italian restaurant, fine white vine, delicious food. Not fancy place but old school restaurant atmosphere..."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-02): "I recently had the pleasure of dining at Zairo in Padova, and I can confidently say it was an extraordinary experience. The alioscoglio pasta I had was hands down the best I‚Äôve ever tasted‚Äîperfectly prepared, full of flavor, and a true testament to Italian culinary tradition. What truly set Zairo apart, though, was their collection of the oldest, most authentic Italian desserts. Each bite felt like a journey through Italy‚Äôs rich history of sweet indulgence. The service was impeccable, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting. If you‚Äôre in Padova, Zairo is a must-visit for anyone who loves authentic Italian cuisine and desserts. I can‚Äôt wait to return!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-26): "Fantastic place, as soon as I entered got completely immersed in this modern neoclassical room, that beautifully paintings in the wall and a set of statues setting the environment. About the food, had the house entrance, and it was this perfect carpaccio that made me question about what I knew about carpaccio. Me and my date had two different steaks from the grill, the flavour was perfect, and the sides as well, just wish it was a bit softer... The house wine is a very good deal, and it's price is hard to beat, even more taking in account the place you are. Overall, excellent place, with decent price quality ratio."
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-15): "A place to come back. Besides the excellent location, in Prato della Valle, the inside deco is like an antique museum. Food is great, from pasta to pizza. Prices are medium. Attention is kind but slow. I recommend to book before. Bathroom is big and clean."
    - (1 stars, 2025-01-16): "Beautiful restaurant right near Prato. Unfortunately, the food is lacking immensely. My gnocchi was inedible and I had to send it back. Thankfully they didn‚Äôt make me pay. Spaghetti di vongole was average. Would not recommend this restaurant"
    - (2 stars, 2024-11-09): "We were the first guests arriving on a Friday evening, the decor and the surroundings in the restaurant are quite much and feel a bit old-faishoned. We ordered antipasti and a primi piatti. The antipasti was a burrata with a fried and stuffed zuchini flower with a burrata and a parmiggiana. Unfortunately the Burrata was a bit sour, which I only noticed after eating it. This is normally not a good sign for the quality of the produce. The parmiggiana was okay. The primi piatti were a carbonara and the home-made gnocchi with pumpkin sauce and truffles. Unfortunately the Carbonara was not good, I am pretty convinced there was cream in it and the meat was also rather conventional bacon then guanciale. The gnocchi were okay, too soft for my liking the sauce was tasteless and the truffles didn't have a good flavour either. The house wine was really not good, it had a sour taste and was bubbling a bit, we drank it however as we do not like to return drinks that we ordered. The service was okay, however the staff acted a bit weird. We were not asked wether we liked our food, wine and water were not served but just put on the table. I am pretty sure there are many better options in the old town of Padua for Pasta and authentic food and vine. Unfortunately I would not recommend this restaurant."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2023-09-26): "Orsucci is an established institution and must try when in Padova. They are very popular, especially for takeaways, so expect to wait for your pizza. They have ~5 table and if you decide to dine in, they give you the pizza on a sheet of paper that you have to carefully transport to your seat. The pizzas were piping hot, right out of the oven. The crust was crispy, the tomato sauce flavorful and rich, and the topics fresh. Honest, simple and tasty! The pizzas are quite small, however the price is accordingly low ranging from 3.90‚Ç¨ to 6‚Ç¨. Great food-quality-price ratio."
    - (5 stars, 2022-11-02): "We had a zingara and a white toscana and we got the two things you wish for when you want a good pizza - simplicity and taste. Also, they got Forst - the best italian lager."
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-15): "Very cheap and traditional place in Padova. Pizza is not the kind you would expect in Italy, very oily with tick dough. Would suggest to get 3 pizzas for 2 people"

    - (5 stars, 2023-08-20): "The best italian pizza I have ever ate! Very nice and helpful service. If you are in Padua, it is definitely worth stopping by :)"

    - (2 stars, 2025-04-28): "I'm extremely disappointed by their food. Service is fine and the waiters are very helpful. However, they're not able to cook even a steak properly which costs 28 euros! The desert wasn't good either. Portions are too small for the price. Not recommended."
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-10): "First time we came in because it looked cozy, and we were lucky there was an empty table for two. Second time we got a reservation, which I recommend you do, and got beautiful table with a view. Ambient, the view and most importantly food were just amazing. Bigoli al ragu bianco d'antara (duck ragu) are a must try! They have nice prossecco, good grilled meat, and great tiramisu. We'll come back, for sure."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-17): "We ate a delicious pasta with tuna and olives, I would also highly recommend their Tiramisu. The atmosphere and service was impacable as well."
    - (4 stars, 2022-07-14): "Once I was here for lunch and once for dinner. You can sit in the evening on the terrace, for lunch it is closed. If you want to get a table in the terrace, you need to make a reservation,botherwise it might be allergy r booked out. The staff is very attentive and kind. They also speak English and have a English menu. There is no WiFi available. The restaurant has an air condition, which make your stay more pleasant. Once I had ravioli with shrimps and scallops, which was really tasty, had a creamy texture despite there were no milk products added. The salad is good and basic. The mixed vegetable plate was a proper portion with zucchini, eggplant, green chicory leaves and tomato. If you order the pasta e fragioli, be aware it is a bean soup with some shredded tagliolini inside. The price is acceptable and it looks like a clean restaurant. Just the air in the toilet is a bit stuffy. At least you do not need to walk steps as it is next to the bar on the ground level. Nice interior, it is bright, italian style."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-26): "This place was absolutely amazing! Pasta was perfectly made and cooked and everything was delicious. Great views of the surrounding city as well. If you are visiting Padova, I highly recommend checking this spot out."

Reviews:
    - (3 stars, 2025-05-17): "As a couple we visited Veganda as a quick stop for lunch and ordered a ‚Äúclassic‚Äù and ‚Äúmushroom‚Äù burger. We obviously missed that this cool dinner-like restaurant atmosphere was strictly vegan. Maybe we also misinterpreted the meaning of ‚Äúburger‚Äù which typically means a patty of ground beef grilled and placed between two halves of a bun. Veganda uses a loose interpretation of ‚Äúburger,‚Äù as applied to any cut bun with a hot filling, even when the filling does not contain beef, such as a chicken burger, salmon burger, pulled pork burger, veggie burger, etc. Veganda also does not specify that what is in between the bun is a Vegan Pattie. Vegan patties are typically beans (especially soybeans and tofu), nuts, grains, seeds, or fungi such as mushrooms or mycoprotein. These vegan burgers have a high proportion of an ultra-processed food, which are typically associated with poor health outcomes. Also, the lectin protein of plants are known to damage the gastrointestinal (GI) lining resulting in the creation of gaps of the GI lining responsible for a host of health and disease problems. So, after an hour of eating only half of this burger creation we both felt abdominal discomfort and cramps. Not a good outcome for something that is toted as health food and costs nearly 10 euro each. I was really grossed out when the staff behind the counter handling food sneezed in to his hands and never bothered to wash before handling customers products. Veganda was a different experience we wish to never have again."
    - (1 stars, 2025-05-29): "We were quite disappointed by our dinner here. The service felt indifferent and unwelcoming, with little attention to guests throughout the evening. The food was equally underwhelming‚Äîmore of a fast-food approach to veganism than anything culinary. The menu leans heavily on imitation meat, fake cheese, and processed ingredients, rather than celebrating fresh vegetables or creative plant-based cooking. At some point during our meal, the cook came out and sat at a nearby table to smoke cigarettes‚Äîright on the open-air terrace where diners were still eating. While the smoking itself wasn‚Äôt the issue, witnessing this so close while trying to enjoy a meal made for a rather strange and unpleasant atmosphere. Sadly, not an experience we‚Äôd recommend."
    - (5 stars, 2024-07-14): "We had a Great experience, the waitress was nice and there were a lot of great options. We were so happy to finally find a fully vegan place in Italy. We arrived in the afternoon during a heat wave so it was almost empty."
    - (5 stars, 2024-03-11): "We came to dive in Y40 near Padua, and we were delighted to have found this place. The pool was 20km distance from the restaurant and we drove everyday just to eat there. Food is 100% vegan, delicious and that make it on the spot after you order, so you get freshly made meal. We highly recommend this place. Plus, it's really cozy."
    - (3 stars, 2024-01-02): "Great atmosphere and location. However the food was a little disappointing. We took some people that we were traveling with that had never eaten at a vegan restaurant before and I‚Äôm worried that they never will try again. The pasta of the day was pesto and when I say it literally had zero flavor‚Ä¶. I mean it. Like none. It felt pointless to eat it. The wraps were good (I am glad my husband got two entrees so I could eat the wrap instead of the pasta) , burgers were okay. The mixed bruschetta was visually appealing but half of the choices were lacking in flavor or tasted only of mayonnaise. We waited over two hours for our food when we were some of the first people there. Might have been better as a lunch spot but I don‚Äôt think we will be back."

Reviews:
    - (1 stars, 2024-08-17): "Nightmare. Chef was a old lady that looked like it came from "Chucky", food was "Mehh" , the price for the food was way higher. waitresses looked like it was new , I bet the owner(chef) constantly changes the waitresses ,and there is only those two that cover the restaurant. There is no organization , menu is a mess ,only the chef knows how that works, because even the waitresses didn't understand. We said at first we wanted the simple menu, and they brought us pasta, latter we asked if was there anything else from the menu that will be coming , and she said you are not eating from simple menu, but if you want ,we can bring the part that is left ,and we asked for fritures(fish had a poisonous taste). After that we asked for coffee since it was on the menu included. IT looked like they just got some coffee cups from someone else,and directly poured our coffee there, which we did not drink. And when we went to pay ,the chef said , 64Euro, and we said why, we were having the menu. she replied with -"No, not menu" , she counted everything as on its own. Stay way from this terrible place."
    - (5 stars, 2023-10-23): "The best: the sea food. All types of seed food are highly recommended. I tried the pasta with cozze and pasta alle vongole, and there were all good. Fish of the day grilled is also good. There are 2 types of menus with 2 different prices. From Monday to Friday is cheaper, you can find the basic menu at 15. The weekends are 22 and 25‚Ç¨. Portions are big, actually just one primo or secondo is ok. The attention of the waiter was good. There are tables outside and inside."
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-10): "We had a very good lunch there in the 1 of January, the food was very tasty. There are different options for set menus. The place is located near Abbazia di Santa Giustina and feels very local and friendly. Tiramisu was fantastic!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-01-02): "Wonderful place slightly off the beaten track. Fish only. 3 or 4 set menus. Take the full one. Has a great tasting starter. Pasta is substantial. Calamari amazing. Kick back go for a few hrs. Wine is cheap, just 5eur for half a litre. Great, friendly staff."
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-17): "The best sea food from my life, they had a special menu on a Saturday night, trully amazing! thank you for the experience!"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-22): "Great food and excellent service! They gave us free dessert at the end. Also,prices are amazing. Definitely recommend. üòä"
    - (4 stars, 2025-06-22): "Nice restaurant near the church and very reasonably priced. Copertta covered rosemary bread and baklava. We shared the porcetta pizza which was delicious. Also had croquette which were OK. Toilet was clean and staff were friendly."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-08): "Excellent pizza, one of the best I ever had! Great service, kind waiters and the wine was superior! I wish I will come back to have another slice one day ü§©"
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-30): "We recently had the pleasure of enjoying pizza in Padua, and I must say, it was a fantastic experience from start to finish. The service was incredibly good and remarkably fast. –ûur order was taken promptly, and our pizzas arrived at the table in no time, perfectly hot and fresh. This efficiency really made for a pleasant dining experience. What truly stood out was the exceptionally friendly staff. Everyone we interacted with was welcoming, attentive, and genuinely seemed to enjoy their work. They created a warm and inviting atmosphere that made us feel right at home. A huge bonus for travelers is that the staff also spoke excellent English. This made ordering a breeze and allowed us to ask questions about the menu without any language barriers. It's always a relief when you can communicate easily, and it definitely enhanced our visit. And of course, the pizza itself was absolutely delicious! The crust was perfectly crispy, the toppings were fresh and high-quality, and the flavors were outstanding. I highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for a great pizza experience in Padua."
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-25): "Pizza was delicious here. Also pretty cheap. Waiter was very kind and helpful. We got appetizer and dessert for free included. Service is not automatically included on the receipt and we saw waiter really appreciated the tip. The best place to eat around the area."

I will never stop dreaming about the double smash burger and they even took the time to explain to me what was inside, even tho we couldn‚Äôt speak Italian. They make everything themselves and we really enjoyed it!!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-01-16): "Great place. So many vegan/vegetarian options. Good prices and ambiance."
    - (1 stars, 2024-09-15): "Slow even when not busy. Service stopped when busy. Our food did not arrive after well over an hour. We gave up. Many beers not available. Three English guys unhappy with the English Pub. A shame. PS. Thanks for your reply to my original post. To clarify, 3 beers were not available (which happened to be the first 3 choices preferred). The service was super slow even before it got busy. The food delay was huge, even for a busy pub (about a 90 minute delay). It's a shame because everything else was excellent. The beer quality and the selection are wonderful. The food we saw others eating looked tasty and exciting. It was a very warm and cosy atmosphere, and I really wish you well, but last night was a total failure: we left late and very hungry. Feedback is meant to help and not start a war. Imagine if people don't take the time to give feedback and rather decide never to return. Consider feedback, please, and you'll perhaps have a perfect pub."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-25): "Fast, even though it was Sunday evening and we hadn't booked: only 10 minutes to get 3 takeaway pizzas. Possibility to sit outside and I assume to also reserve some seats, because I had seen the "reserved" sign on a table. Inside I noticed a small free area where maybe this winter they will make seats inside (I hope so!). Good prices (a little lower than other takeaway pizzerias in the area) and adequate quantities. Excellent quality of the pizza: light, digestible, does not make you thirsty, cooked properly. Expertly managed electric oven. Wide choice of pizzas, but also of other delicacies: baguettes, calzones, pizza sandwiches, panzerotti, fried foods. Possibility of having wholemeal dough, Naples dough, Roman-style pizza in a shovel (upon reservation). Also available in family and mignon sizes for pizzas. Possibility of home delivery. Only flaw: parking in the area. Either you sneak into the nearby streets or it's better to go on foot or by motorbike/bike. First experience I would say very positive! We will definitely be back soon. 2X Pizza 4 formaggi (‚Ç¨8 X 2) 1X Pizza prosciutto, mushrooms + spicy salami (‚Ç¨7 + ‚Ç¨1 added salami + ‚Ç¨1 Napoli dough = ‚Ç¨9) Total ‚Ç¨25 From the menu, if you exclude any additions or special dough, the maximum price for a pizza is ‚Ç¨9.50."
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-16): "I went to this pizzeria recently and I have to say it was a great experience. The pizza is excellent and well seasoned with good quality ingredients. The staff is very kind and helpful, ready to satisfy every request with a smile. The environment is rather simple but welcoming, almost familiar. It will definitely become my point of reference when I want a good pizza ‚ò∫Ô∏è"

    - (1 stars, 2025-03-11): "The pizza is not bad, but the problem is that if you get a pizza that has raw ingredients, these will be placed on the pizza by the cashier with bare hands and not by the pizza chefs, who are supposed to have clean hands.     - (1 stars, 2025-02-12): "A sheet of paper is thicker than these pizzas, the one with chips had 4 on top and in the Margherita we found pieces of cooked ham. The staff are friendly and helpful and the pizzas were ready at the time indicated to me."
    - (5 stars, 2022-01-03): "The location is not the most convenient for finding parking, however, apart from that, the quality and goodness of the pizza speak for themselves. The half-meter Pizzalonga for two people is very good and light (and if you are a bummer like me with a bit of effort you can finish it by yourself, if it is not full of ingredients). Still referring to the Pizzalonga and not the normal round pizzas, the prices are a bit higher than normal: be careful because on the menu the prices refer to half the pizza, so 1/4 of a meter, and a Pizzalonga can lead to a more expensive bill than expected. But, in my opinion, it is okay every now and then. We have taken many half-meter pizzas spending quite a bit of money, and we have been offered beers and even a branded bottle opener. It is not the first time that this has happened to us, even in other Pizzalonga pizzerias, it is certainly a very appreciated gesture."

Phone: 049 490 6678

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2024-08-01): "I don‚Äôt even know what to say.. I had some of the best meat I have ever tried here at this restaurant. The pasta was the best pasta I have ever tried, and the dessert was super delicious and well balanced. The restaurant was decorated in a very subtle yet classy way, and they played very nice, calm music. The service was amazing, they advised us in great detail about what to order and they were able to tell us about the dishes in great detail. I would definitely recommend the place to anyone who visits the area!"
    - (5 stars, 2023-08-14): "Great restaurant, food was delicious and service was great, the waiter Martin was very helpful, nice and explained everything in English. Definitely to recommend!"
    - (4 stars, 2022-03-05): "GOOD QUALITY, AMAZING DISHES, KIND SERVICE, NICE PRESENTATION, but SLOW SERVICE. Respect of Covid-19 measurements. Overall SUGGESTED."
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-05): "5 stars is too little for such a gem of a restaurant, I'd give at least 7 if I could... Spent 3 nights in Padua and despite initially wanting to try other restaurants we ended up going here for dinner every day. Like another reviewer said somewhere below, I had some of the best meat ever in this place, and it's not for a lack of experience. If you go for the burgers, the meat in there will be some of the best you've ever eaten, if you go for a steak the meat will be some of the best you've ever eaten, even if you go for the pasta or some polpettine, the meat in there will be well, you catch my drift... That doesn't mean that dishes without meat are any less quality of course. Would warmly recommend the Gran Grigliata Toscana to anyone lucky enough to visit this restaurant when they offer it, it's an experience you won't forget! And that's just half of the story. It may sound like I'm laying it on a bit thick at this point, but the entire staff was so kind, well coordinated and attentive that dining here felt almost like performance art (in a totally unpretentious way). They really work hard and it shows. All in all, the whole experience was as perfect as things can get. Thanks again for the wonderful experiences (and tastes), will definitely remember this place for the rest of my life. And to anyone visiting Padua - trust me, walking/driving those couple extra minutes to get out of the strict centre is totally worth it! Complimenti!"
    - (4 stars, 2022-11-23): "Very tasty food, staff a bit to busy and forgetting ordered items."

    - (3 stars, 2025-03-27): "The best: the service. The waiters are kind, they speak English and Italian. They offer some kind of welcome aperitivo before the meal with bread and 3 types of dipping sauce and at the end a shot of some Indian digestive. Portions of dishes are big, enough for one person. Inside is comfy and warm. Curry chicken was good. Paneer was so so."
    - (4 stars, 2025-03-18): "We went to this Indian restaurant, and it was very good. We really enjoyed the food and had a nice time."
    - (5 stars, 2022-09-04): "This restaurant's decorations, music and smell fits perfectly the country that it represents. It was the second time I try indian food so I was familiar with all the spices and and strong flavours. The dishes were delicious, appealing and, something I appreciated were the traditional plates and cutlery. The personal was always available, they came in to check every now and then if the food is good and everything is going well. I would give 4 stars for the lack of parking lot but it is a general problem in that zone, and what they lack in parking they make up in spices ;)"
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-21): "Exceptional experience! We got there in the late afternoon and were happy to know that the restaurant was still open. What immediately impressed me was the overall Indian theme of the restaurant (even the music was spot on) and how kind the staff were. We decided to give the daily lunch meal a go and fell in love with the food. I highly recommend it!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-10-27): "When we entered, a very Indian atmosphere, beautiful interior and very clean, the staff were very inviting, had a glimpse of the kitchen very clean, the food was very scrumptious and presentation was very good . Loved the Naan. Will definitely go again next time we visit Padova. Just the parking was difficult to find."

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2023-08-07): "Hidden gem. We would never have ventured in from walking past. On a pretty scruffy street and we walked past without noticing this place on our first night. However after some Google maps research we gave it a go on our last night in Padua as it was a short walk from the apartment. What a find. Fantastic pizza and delish home made puddings for 4, wine for 2, zero alcohol beers and a coffee for me and it came to less than 70 Euros. Fantastic value. Service was super friendly. The garden to the rear was just perfect - really a delightful setting. Everyone else appeared to be local which was a great clue. Maybe 15-20 other diners on a Monday evening. I had the Calabrese and it was one of the BEST pizzas I've ever eaten. The bar across the road, on the corner by the canal was a perfect pre meal stop off too. Also v popular with locals - and I can see why. Worth a tram ride out from the centre of town."
    - (5 stars, 2025-04-23): "Perfect menu, very complete, lasagne incredible!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-26): "really good for tourist and very good food"
    - (5 stars, 2018-07-12): "Best pizza I've ever eaten! The prices were decent and it didn't look like anything special, but we savored every bite. Gnocchi was simple but delicious as well."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-26): "Pizza very goodüëåüëå"

    - (5 stars, 2025-04-21): "This spacious pizzeria with plenty of indoor seating is perfect for a cozy meal with friends or family. The pizzas are delicious, and you get to choose from classic thin crust, Neapolitan-style thick crust, or whole grain dough - a nice touch for all preferences. We went with the Neapolitan pizza, and it did not disappoint: chewy, airy crust, a flavorful tomato sauce, and fresh, high-quality toppings. The menu is extensive, ranging from the beloved classics to more creative choices like pizza with porchetta - so take your time browsing! The dessert of the day was a highlight: a crunchy amaretti base topped with a light, nutty pistachio mousse - airy, fluffy, and full of flavor. The service was friendly and efficient, and the prices are fair for the quality you get. A fantastic spot to enjoy a truly satisfying pizza night!"
    - (4 stars, 2024-11-29): "Pizzeria Al Vecio Cason offers a solid selection of pizza options at affordable prices, making it a great spot for locals. While it may not be in the heart of town, it's worth a visit for a good, no-frills pizza experience. A perfect place to enjoy quality pizza without the tourist crowds!"
    - (5 stars, 2023-08-24): "I was finally able to go to Vecio Cason, and I really liked the pizza I had, and my dinner mates as well. Also Tiramis√π was good. Service really nice and gentle! Maybe a little slow but nothing major at all (the place was very crowded)"

    - (5 stars, 2025-04-17): "Great very helpfull ordered 8 pizzas they were all ready within 10 minutes if not faster"
    - (5 stars, 2023-07-05): "a cozy atmosphere with very good food."
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-13): "Very good experience of m√©diterean kitchen thanks"

Website: https://www.suvlakigreco.it/
Phone: 351 500 2151

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-29): "We drove all the way from Venice to Padova for this place and it exceeded all our expectations. Delicious authentic greek suvlaki. We tried everything: chicken, pork, pancetta, gyros and all kinds of meat were super fresh and tasty. Super clean place with amazing people who prepare everything with care in very affordable prices for such high quality food. Try it today and thank me later :))"
    - (5 stars, 2024-05-22): "I love this place, by far the best greek place in town. I highly recommend it for the taste, cleanliness and friendly people serving the food"
    - (5 stars, 2019-06-10): "This is an original a Greek Souvlaki place! Owned and worked by Greek people only and you can tell the difference in the products! You can also find Greek beer and amazing desserts like ‚Äúkataifi‚Äù and ‚Äú baklava‚Äù ! It‚Äôs seriously delicious and everyone there is very friendly! They even deliver!!!"
    - (4 stars, 2021-10-02): "Our first experience with Greek food. Certainly was good. Small outlet but reposnsive and passionate people behind the counter. Wait times are long upto 40mins but that is also because they make everything fresh. They also have a delivery option but with the wait times it is a bit confusing when it would arrive. I chose to go and get food myself. We tried the chicken panini."
    - (5 stars, 2021-10-10): "It is just an amazing place to eat, everything's so delicious (and hygienic) that you can't get enough! And the staff is so welcoming and kind, you will love it!"

Reviews:
    - (2 stars, 2022-02-25): "1h 25min to deliver, burrito arrived totally cold and to add insult to injury, the delivery guy insisted on specifying: "it's freshly made, but we recommend heating it up for a minute". Freshly made?? Surely a sincere "we apologize for the mix-up" would have been more appropriate and appreciated. Furthermore, the burrito was nothing more than a blob filled with 70% white rice. I would say that, at least for the burrito department and the delivery management, we are really not there."
    - (5 stars, 2024-11-17): "A welcoming and spacious place. The ideal venue for parties of various kinds, adaptable to all tastes. Great hospitality and professionalism on the part of the legendary Rosy and her Luciano who thoughtfully think of every detail. Highly recommended"
    - (5 stars, 2024-05-07): "The girls are very good and quick, kind in every request and above all they meet all dietary needs (vegan-gluten free). Clean, bright and sunny environment. Great place to have parties. Ample parking. Small detail: they eliminated the fast food line and in my opinion it is now much better both in terms of quality and service!"
    - (3 stars, 2025-02-06): "Kind and friendly staff, quiet environment."
    - (4 stars, 2022-11-10): "Great bar for an aperitif or even to eat. Rosy the owner is nice and friendly. Recommended. You can also organize private parties and the price is not excessive."

Automato Pizza is a restaurant located at Via Jacopo Crescini, 141/BIS, 35126. 
It has an average rating of 4.5 over 5 based on 20 costumers.
Unfortunately, price is not available. This restaurant offers delivery, dine-in, and reservation services. 
Opening hours:
 open daily from 6:00 ‚Äì 10:00 PM.

Website: https://automatopizza.com/
Phone: 329 973 4138

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-05-20): "Excellent pizzas, I have ordered many times from this pizzeria and it has never disappointed me, I repeat never. Quantity, quality and price are the best. The pizza in the photo cost me 8.50 with shipping included, ordered through their application, which I recommend downloading as you get a 10% discount on the first order. I only buy their pizza now and only now. Please look at the amount of chips, if I think that with other pizzerias I can count how many chips there are üòíüò≠. And then they respect the shipping time."
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-22): "Home delivery Exceptional pizza! From the dough to the filling... everything was delicious I will definitely order again in this place :)"
    - (5 stars, 2025-02-05): "Not bad at all! I ordered the pizzas for 8.30pm and at 8.25pm ‚Äã‚Äãthe delivery boy was already at home. Good pizza, good ingredients and light and digestible dough. The value for money is really excellent. Next time I have a pizza at home I will definitely order it here!"
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-15): "Very good pizza, they are super polite, VERY PROFESSIONAL staff, in my opinion one of the best takeaway pizzerias in Padua. I think I will always order from them from now on, I highly recommend it to everyone."
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-30): "Good pizza with chips, plentiful and freshly made chips. Friendly and punctual rider service. App done well. Good prices."

Pizzeria Ristorante Capovolta is a meal delivery located at Via Jacopo Facciolati, 168, 35127. 
It has an average rating of 4.3 over 5 based on 2177 costumers.
It is considered moderate ($$). This restaurant offers delivery, dine-in, and reservation services. It serves lunch, dinner, beer, and wine. 

Opening hours:
 open daily from 6:00 PM ‚Äì 12:00 AM.

Website: http://ristorantecapovolta.com/
Phone: 049 757407

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-29): "We had a dinner here. Or at least we thought it will be a small dinner. We finished by having antipasti, pizza, deserts and drinks. Atmosphere was topical Italian. Everyone happy and talking loudly but not disturbing. Outside 36 * Celsius but inside..air conditioning üëç. We took a tabel at the second floor. Starting hour:19.00 on Sunday. 1 Aperitivo Casa, 2 lemonade, 1 cocktail of shrimps with a special sauce, 1 melanzane alla parmigiana (aubergine with tomato sauce and parmigiana), 1 pizza Massaria and 1 tiramisu + coperta= 56 ‚Ç¨. Everything was delicious. The tomato sauce had no taste of canned one. So, nice place. If I ever come again in Padova for sure I'll not gone miss this place. üëç"
    - (5 stars, 2022-11-10): "Probably one of my favorite places in Padova! Simply very deliciousüòã everything I‚Äôve tried so far I just completely loved. Stuff speaks English, it is also a huge advantage."
    - (5 stars, 2024-07-14): "During our travels through the historical cities of Italy, we also try to find authentic cuisine. Visiting Capovolta two nights in a row turned out to be more than a good choice. Pleasant environment, tasty food and great service with which we could experience very intense cheering during this year's football Euro match. A big surprise that the Italian restaurant serves our hearty and national Pilsner Urquell, although this time we preferred good wine. We tried pizza, gnocchi and pasta from the meals and everything was perfectly fine. Greetings to everyone from the service and we hope that they are still rooting for the right team today."
    - (5 stars, 2023-10-16): "Very nice food and service!"
    - (5 stars, 2020-01-22): "Our favourite pizza restaurant in Padova. The first bite packs a nice and subtle crunch, followed by the tasty sauce and ample toppings! Overall an excellent pizza with quality ingredients. Shout out to the very friendly service ad well!"

Reviews:
    - (5 stars, 2022-12-04): "Became a regular there after living in the area for a few weeks and we visited almost every day. It's the best pizza we've had in Padova. The craft beers are phenomenal. And the owners always greet you with a smile. Can be very busy on weekends so better reserve."
    - (4 stars, 2019-01-02): "Guinnes 4 ever!"
    - (5 stars, 2024-09-14): "User did not leave a review."
    - (5 stars, 2025-03-22): "Welcoming environment, very kind and friendly staff and owner. In my opinion the pizza is excellent especially its dough, light and thin and with excellent ingredients. The homemade desserts are also good. I will definitely come back."
    - (5 stars, 2025-06-01): "So I'll start with the property, Rumena, Mrs. Cristina is an excellent hostess, she welcomes you very well and is very kind and witty at the same time, üòâ. Even her husband, a pizza chef, is a nice person. The pizza is not bad, unfortunately they follow the local taste and not the real Neapolitan pizza, but I think it's right like this. Overall the place is very pleasant, the service could be improved a bit, a friend said it was the fault of the high turnout that day, in the good context. Well done, keep it up. üí™üëç"

Reviews:
    - (1 stars, 2023-06-13): "The worst experience I've ever had. They told us that we can choose either the menu of the day or pizza. Some of us wanted pizza and some menus. The pizza they only wanted to make two choices of theirs and we wanted something else such as ham and mushrooms tuna and onion etc etc.. no nothing to do they sent us out because they didn't have time to waste on us. From waiters to chefs they are rude at best I don't recommend this place ü§¢ü§Æ"
    - (5 stars, 2017-01-14): "Delicious pizza, really well made, easy to digest and very well seasoned. excellent choice of beers and various snacks. There are many other dishes and sandwiches on the menu, but I have never tried them. Friendly staff and fast service. It has recently been renovated, in summer it has many outdoor tables under a pergola. very unsigned"
    - (5 stars, 2022-12-02): "Very beautiful and particular place, the organ on the wall is very beautiful. Excellent pizza, super beer and very kind and polite staff! Everything top"

Reviews:
    - (4 stars, 2025-01-25): "KIND STAFF, GOOD FOOD, unfortunately we were near a noisy large group (15) in an other table and talking among us was almost impossible. RECOMMEND to FOOD LOVERS"
    - (5 stars, 2022-07-13): "Don't be intimidated by the challenge to reach the location, the front or the interior. If you can eat outside where it's gorgeous. Food is unique and delicious with caring and efficient service. The most fantastic Bigoli with anchovies. Memorable."
    - (3 stars, 2023-10-08): "Very beautiful location and decent food for the region. Called in advanced and was told they had a high chair for our children, once we arrived we were told our 3 year old would have to sit in a normal chair so throughout lunch she kept falling out of the chair while trying to reach the table. Also, when placing an order we asked for 1 plate of bigoli to be split between out 2 children, when we received 1 full portion of ragu and a separate plate we were told we would need to separate the bigoli ourselves. Which is not an issue for us we do it all the time but not in the middle of a restaurant. Then come to find out that they misunderstood us and thought we ordered 2 portions of bigoli. We had a good laugh at that especially when i happened again for dessert. And horrible coffee which was suprising. All in all this place has lots of potential but the service is what ultimately ruined the experience. Not worth the"
    - (5 stars, 2023-10-30): "Every dish was exceptionally good and balanced perfectly. Traditional Venetian cooking run as a family buisness. I would gladly return to try out the rest of their menu."
    - (5 stars, 2018-05-03): "Very regional and authentic cuisine. Quiet place and the service was excellent as well"
